title: Math23k_13801
description: Question:小新家养鹅7只，养鸭10只．养鹅的只数是鸭的几分之几？
full litex:
claim:
    forall geese, ducks, ratio R:
        geese = 7
        ducks = 10
        ratio = geese / ducks
        =>:
            ratio = 7 / 10
    prove:
        ratio = 7 / 10

title: Math23k_5391
description: Question:育英小学高年级有学生120人，中年级有学生130人，低年级有学生140人，中年级人数占全校人数的几分之几？
full litex:
claim:
    forall high, middle, low, total, ratio R:
        high = 120
        middle = 130
        low = 140
        total = high + middle + low
        ratio = middle / total
        =>:
            ratio = 1 / 3
    prove:
        total = 120 + 130 + 140 = 390
        ratio = 130 / 390
        ratio = (130 / 130) / (390 / 130) = 1 / 3

title: Math23k_20599
description: Question:工厂运来40吨煤，用去总数的62.5%，还剩多少吨？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_coal, used_coal, remaining_coal R:
        total_coal = 40
        used_coal = total_coal * 0.625
        remaining_coal = total_coal - used_coal
        =>:
            remaining_coal = 15
    prove:
        used_coal = 40 * 0.625 = 25
        remaining_coal = 40 - 25 = 15

title: Math23k_18320
description: Question:爸爸将20000元存入银行，定期一年，年利率是3.06%．准备到期后把税后利息捐给“希望工程”．利息税是20%，爸爸能捐款多少元？
full litex:
claim:
    forall principal, interest_rate, tax_rate, interest_before_tax, interest_after_tax R:
        principal = 20000
        interest_rate = 3.06 / 100
        tax_rate = 20 / 100
        interest_before_tax = principal * interest_rate
        interest_after_tax = interest_before_tax * (1 - tax_rate)
        =>:
            interest_after_tax = 489.6
    prove:
        interest_rate = 3.06 / 100 = 0.0306
        interest_before_tax = 20000 * 0.0306 = 612
        tax_rate = 20 / 100 = 0.2
        interest_after_tax = 612 * (1 - 0.2) = 612 * 0.8 = 489.6

title: Math23k_21344

        width = 7
        height = 6
        side = 6
        volume = side * side * side
        =>:

title: Math23k_5936
description: Question:一列火车每小时行驶180千米，比一辆汽车的速度快120千米．从甲城到乙城火车行驶了3小时，汽车需要行驶多少小时？
full litex:
claim:
    forall train_speed, car_speed, train_time, car_time, distance R:
        train_speed = 180
        car_speed = train_speed - 120
        train_time = 3
        distance = train_speed * train_time
        car_time = distance / car_speed
        =>:
            car_time = 9
    prove:
        car_speed = 180 - 120 = 60
        distance = 180 * 3 = 540
        car_time = 540 / 60 = 9

title: Math23k_15500
description: Question:六年级二班共有学生45人，其中女生有21人，再增加多少名女生，这时女生人数刚好是全班人数的(1/2)．
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, girls, add, girls_new, total_new R:
        total = 45
        girls = 21
        girls_new = girls + add
        total_new = total + add
        girls_new = (1/2) * total_new
        =>:
            add = 3
    prove:
        2 * girls_new = 2 * ((1/2) * total_new)
        2 * girls_new = total_new
        2 * (girls + add) = total + add
        2 * girls + 2 * add = total + add
        2 * girls + 2 * add - add = total
        2 * girls + add = total
        add = total - 2 * girls
        2 * girls = 2 * 21
        2 * girls = 42
        add = 45 - 42
        add = 3

        orange_boxes = 30 * 3 = 90

title: Math23k_14676
description: Question:一台电视机，现价2400元比原价降低(1/7)，这台电视机比原价降低了多少元？

        discount_amount = original_price * discount_rate
        =>:
            discount_amount = 400
    prove:

title: Math23k_23103
description: Question:一段电线，长(2/5)米，截去(1/5)后，再接上4米，结果比原来电线长多少米．
full litex:
claim:
    forall original_length, cut_length, new_length, difference R:
        original_length = 2 / 5
        cut_length = original_length * (1 / 5)
        new_length = (original_length - cut_length) + 4
        difference = new_length - original_length
        =>:
            difference = 3.92
    prove:
        cut_length = (2 / 5) * (1 / 5) = 2 / 25
        new_length = ((2 / 5) - (2 / 25)) + 4 = (10 / 25 - 2 / 25) + 4 = (8 / 25) + 4 = (8 / 25) + (100 / 25) = 108 / 25
        difference = (108 / 25) - (2 / 5) = (108 / 25) - (10 / 25) = 98 / 25 = 3.92

title: Math23k_16621
description: Question:修一条公路，第一周修了这条路的(2/5)，第二周修了这条路的(1/4)，再修14千米就完成任务．这条公路全长多少千米？

title: Math23k_9403
description: Question:甲乙两个城市之间的公路长240千米．一辆汽车在高速公路上平均每小时可行驶80千米，在普通公路上平均每小时只能行驶40千米．这辆汽车从甲市到乙市走高速公路要比走普通公路节省多少时间？

title: Math23k_1713
description: Question:某工厂有480人，其中女工占(5/8)，后来又调进若干女工，这是女工占现有工厂总人数的(3/4)，后来调入女工多少人？
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    b != 0
    d != 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

claim:
    forall total_initial, female_ratio_initial, female_initial, total_after, female_after, target_ratio, x R:
        total_initial = 480
        female_ratio_initial = 5/8
        target_ratio = 3/4
        female_initial = total_initial * female_ratio_initial
        total_after = total_initial + x
        female_after = female_initial + x
        total_after != 0
        4 != 0
        female_after / total_after = target_ratio
        =>:
            x = 240
    prove:
        female_initial = 480 * (5/8)
        female_initial = 300

        female_after = 300 + x
        total_after = 480 + x
        female_after / total_after = 3/4

        $cross_multiply(female_after, total_after, 3, 4)
        4 * female_after = 3 * total_after

        4 * female_after = 4 * (300 + x)
        4 * (300 + x) = 4 * 300 + 4 * x
        4 * female_after = 4 * 300 + 4 * x
        4 * 300 = 1200
        4 * female_after = 1200 + 4 * x

        3 * total_after = 3 * (480 + x)
        3 * (480 + x) = 3 * 480 + 3 * x
        3 * total_after = 3 * 480 + 3 * x
        3 * 480 = 1440
        3 * total_after = 1440 + 3 * x

        4 * female_after = 3 * total_after
        1200 + 4 * x = 1440 + 3 * x

        (1200 + 4 * x) - (1200 + 3 * x) = (1440 + 3 * x) - (1200 + 3 * x)

        =:
            (1200 + 4 * x) - (1200 + 3 * x)
            1200 + 4 * x - 1200 - 3 * x
            4 * x - 3 * x
            x

        =:
            (1440 + 3 * x) - (1200 + 3 * x)
            1440 + 3 * x - 1200 - 3 * x
            1440 - 1200 + 3 * x - 3 * x
            240 + 0
            240

        x = 240

title: Math23k_10025
description: Question:小红乘船以6千米/时的速度从A到B，然后，又乘船以12千米/时的速度沿原路返回，那么小红在乘船往返的行程中，平均每小时行驶多少千米．
full litex:
know @pos_div(a, b R):
    a > 0
    b > 0
    =>:
        a / b > 0

know @pos_implies_nonzero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        not x = 0

claim:
    forall d, v_go, v_back, t1, t2, T, S, v_avg R:
        d > 0
        v_go = 6
        v_back = 12
        t1 = d / v_go
        t2 = d / v_back
        T = t1 + t2
        S = d + d
        v_avg = S / T
        =>:
            v_avg = 8
    prove:
        t1 = d / 6
        t2 = d / 12

        =:
            T
            t1 + t2
            d / 6 + d / 12
            2 * d / 12 + d / 12
            (2 * d + d) / 12
            3 * d / 12
            d / 4
        T = d / 4

        =:
            S
            d + d
            2 * d

        4 > 0
        $pos_div(d, 4)
        T > 0
        $pos_implies_nonzero(T)
        $pos_implies_nonzero(d)

        =:
            v_avg
            S / T
            (2 * d) / (d / 4)
            (2 * d) * (4 / d)
            (8 * d) / d
            8 * (d / d)
            8 * 1
            8
        v_avg = 8

title: Math23k_8097
description: Question:师徒二人加工一批零件，师傅单独做要20天完成，而徒弟每天做27个零件，他们始终合作，当他们共同完成这批零件时，徒弟完成的数量是总数的(2/5)，求这批零件共多少个？
full litex:
know @divide_by_nonzero_preserves_equality(a, b, c R):
    c != 0
    a = b
    =>:
        a / c = b / c

know @gt_zero_implies_not_eq_zero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        x != 0

claim:
    forall total, t, master_rate, apprentice_rate R:
        total > 0
        master_rate = total / 20
        apprentice_rate = 27
        apprentice_rate * t = (2/5) * total
        master_rate * t + apprentice_rate * t = total
        =>:
            total = 810
    prove:
        $divide_by_nonzero_preserves_equality(apprentice_rate * t, (2/5) * total, apprentice_rate)
        (apprentice_rate * t) / apprentice_rate = ((2/5) * total) / apprentice_rate
        apprentice_rate = 27
        (27 * t) / 27 = ((2/5) * total) / 27
        =:
            (27 * t) / 27
            t
        =:
            ((2/5) * total) / 27
            ((2 * total) / 5) / 27
            (2 * total) / (5 * 27)
            (2 * total) / 135
        t = (2 * total) / 135

        master_rate = total / 20
        apprentice_rate = 27
        =:
            master_rate * t + apprentice_rate * t
            (total / 20) * ((2 * total) / 135) + 27 * ((2 * total) / 135)
            (2 * total^2) / 2700 + (54 * total) / 135
            (total^2) / 1350 + (2 * total) / 5
        (master_rate * t + apprentice_rate * t) = total
        (total^2) / 1350 + (2 * total) / 5 = total

        (total^2) / 1350 = total - (2 * total) / 5
        =:
            total - (2 * total) / 5
            (5 * total) / 5 - (2 * total) / 5
            (3 * total) / 5

        1350 * ((total^2) / 1350) = 1350 * ((3 * total) / 5)
        =:
            1350 * ((total^2) / 1350)
            total^2
        =:
            1350 * ((3 * total) / 5)
            270 * (3 * total)
            810 * total
        total^2 = 810 * total

        $gt_zero_implies_not_eq_zero(total)
        total != 0
        $divide_by_nonzero_preserves_equality(total^2, 810 * total, total)
        total^2 / total = (810 * total) / total
        =:
            total^2 / total
            total
        =:
            (810 * total) / total
            810
        total = 810

title: Math23k_17093
description: Question:参加某次数学竞赛的女生和男生人数比是1：3，这次竞赛的平均分是82分，其中男生平均分是80分，女生平均多少分．
full litex:
know @pos_not_zero(x N_pos):
    =>:
        not x = 0

know @mul_cancel_right(a, c, b R):
    not b = 0
    a * b = c * b
    =>:
        a = c

prop avg_meaning(total R, n N_pos, avg R) <=> total = n * avg

claim:
    forall G, B N_pos, avg_overall, avg_boys, avg_girls R, total_people N_pos, girls_total, boys_total, total_score R:
        B = 3 * G
        avg_overall = 82
        avg_boys = 80

        total_people = G + B
        girls_total = G * avg_girls
        boys_total = B * avg_boys
        total_score = girls_total + boys_total

        $avg_meaning(total_score, total_people, avg_overall)
        =>:
            avg_girls = 88
    prove:
        total_people = G + B
        total_people = G + 3 * G
        total_people = 4 * G

        girls_total = G * avg_girls

        boys_total = B * avg_boys
        boys_total = (3 * G) * 80
        boys_total = 240 * G

        total_score = girls_total + boys_total
        total_score = G * avg_girls + 240 * G

        $avg_meaning(total_score, total_people, avg_overall)
        total_score = total_people * avg_overall
        =:
            total_people * avg_overall
            avg_overall * total_people
        =:
            avg_overall * total_people
            82 * total_people
            82 * (4 * G)
            328 * G

        =:
            total_score
            girls_total + boys_total
            G * avg_girls + 240 * G
        G * avg_girls + 240 * G = 328 * G

        G * avg_girls = 328 * G - 240 * G
        G * avg_girls = 88 * G

        =:
            G * avg_girls
            avg_girls * G
        $pos_not_zero(G)
        $mul_cancel_right(avg_girls, 88, G)
        avg_girls = 88

title: Math23k_5538
description: Question:甲、乙两车分别同时从相距380千米的两地相对开出，3小时相遇．已知甲车与乙车速度的比是10：9．相遇时乙车行了多少千米？

        distance_b = 3 * v_b
        =>:

title: Math23k_13250
description: Question:一项工程，预计30人15天可以完成任务．后来工作4天后，又增加3人．如果每人的工作效率相同，这样可以提前几天完成任务？

        people_initial = 30
        people_added = 3
        new_days = remaining_work / (people_initial + people_added)
        days_worked = 4
        original_days = 15
        days_saved = original_days - (days_worked + new_days)
        =>:
            days_saved = 1
    prove:
        total_work = 30 * 15 = 450
        work_done = 30 * 4 = 120
        remaining_work = 450 - 120 = 330

full litex:
claim:
    forall fraction1, fraction2, ratio R:
        fraction1 = 2/15
        fraction2 = 2/5
        ratio = fraction1 / fraction2
        =>:
            ratio = 1/3
    prove:
        ratio = (2/15) / (2/5) = (2/15) * (5/2) = (2*5)/(15*2) = 10/30 = 1/3

title: Math23k_13251
description: Question:一绳子长30米，剪去(3/5)，还剩多少米．

        original_length = 30
        remaining_length = original_length * (1 - 3 / 5)
        =>:
            remaining_length = 12
    prove:
        remaining_length = 30 * (1 - 3 / 5)
        remaining_length = 30 * (5 / 5 - 3 / 5)
        remaining_length = 30 * (2 / 5)
        remaining_length = 30 * 2 / 5 = 60 / 5 = 12

title: Math23k_16286
description: Question:解放军某部出动80辆汽车参加工地劳动，在途中要经过一个长120米的隧道．如果每辆汽车的长为10米，相邻两辆汽车相隔20米，那么，车队以每分钟500米的速度通过隧道，需要多少分钟？
full litex:
claim:
    forall car_length, car_count, gap_length, tunnel_length, speed, total_length, total_distance, time R:
        car_length = 10
        car_count = 80
        gap_length = 20
        tunnel_length = 120
        speed = 500
        total_length = car_count * car_length + (car_count - 1) * gap_length
        total_distance = total_length + tunnel_length
        time = total_distance / speed
        =>:
            time = 5
    prove:
        car_length = 10
        car_count = 80
        gap_length = 20
        tunnel_length = 120
        speed = 500
        total_length = 80 * 10 + (80 - 1) * 20 = 800 + 79 * 20 = 800 + 1580 = 2380
        total_distance = 2380 + 120 = 2500
        time = 2500 / 500 = 5

title: Math23k_1418
description: Question:落圈小学六年级56个学生，其中女生占(4/7)，后来转进几个女同学，这时女同学占全班人数的(3/5)．转进多少个女同学？
full litex:
know @ratio_three_fifths(x, y R):
    x = (3/5) * y
    =>:
        5 * x = 3 * y

claim:
    forall total_init, girls_init, x, total_now, girls_now R:
        total_init = 56
        girls_init = total_init * (4/7)
        girls_now = girls_init + x
        total_now = total_init + x
        girls_now = (3/5) * total_now
        =>:
            x = 4
    prove:
        girls_init = 56 * (4/7)
        girls_init = 32

        girls_now = 32 + x
        total_now = 56 + x

        $ratio_three_fifths(girls_now, total_now)
        5 * girls_now = 3 * total_now

        5 * (32 + x) = 3 * total_now
        =:
            5 * (32 + x)
            160 + 5 * x
        160 + 5 * x = 3 * total_now

        160 + 5 * x = 3 * (56 + x)
        =:
            3 * (56 + x)
            168 + 3 * x
        160 + 5 * x = 168 + 3 * x

        (160 + 5 * x) - 3 * x = (168 + 3 * x) - 3 * x
        =:
            (160 + 5 * x) - 3 * x
            160 + 2 * x
        =:
            (168 + 3 * x) - 3 * x
            168
        160 + 2 * x = 168

        (160 + 2 * x) - 160 = 168 - 160
        =:
            (160 + 2 * x) - 160
            2 * x
        =:
            168 - 160
            8
        2 * x = 8

        (2 * x) / 2 = 8 / 2
        (2 * x) / 2 = x
        x = 4

title: Math23k_14823
description: Question:男学生人数占女学生的40%，那么女学生人数占男学生的多少%
full litex:
know @cancel_common_factor_in_fraction(x, k R):
    x != 0
    k != 0
    =>:
        x / (k * x) = 1 / k

claim:
    forall M, F, percentage R:
        M > 0
        F > 0
        F != 0
        0.4 != 0
        M = 0.4 * F
        percentage = (F / M) * 100
        =>:
            percentage = 250
    prove:
        F = M / 0.4
        F = 2.5 * M
        percentage = (F / M) * 100
        percentage = (F / (0.4 * F)) * 100
        $cancel_common_factor_in_fraction(F, 0.4)
        (F / (0.4 * F)) = 1 / 0.4
        percentage = (1 / 0.4) * 100
        (1 / 0.4) = 2.5
        percentage = 2.5 * 100
        percentage = 250

title: Math23k_10606
description: Question:从2100里“减去50，再加上20”，这称作一次操作，经过多少次操作，所得的结果是0．
full litex:
know @solve_linear_equation(a, b, x R):
    a != 0
    a * x + b = 0
    =>:
        x = -b / a

claim:
    forall start, sub, add, delta, result R, n N_pos:
        start = 2100
        sub = 50
        add = 20
        delta = add - sub
        result = start + n * delta
        result = 0
        =>:
            n = 70
    prove:
        delta = 20 - 50
        delta = -30
        result = 2100 + n * (-30)
        2100 + n * (-30) = 0
        =:
            2100 + n * (-30)
            n * (-30) + 2100
            (-30) * n + 2100
        (-30) * n + 2100 = 0
        -30 != 0
        $solve_linear_equation(-30, 2100, n)
        n = -2100 / (-30)
        n = 2100 / 30
        n = 70

title: Math23k_2154
description: Question:叔叔比小华大20岁，明年叔叔的年龄是小华的3倍，小华今年多少岁？
full litex:
know @sub_same_preserves_eq(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - c = b - c

know @div_same_preserves_eq(a, b, c R):
    c != 0
    a = b
    =>:
        a / c = b / c

claim:
    forall x, uncle, x_next_year, uncle_next_year R:
        uncle = x + 20
        x_next_year = x + 1
        uncle_next_year = uncle + 1
        uncle_next_year = 3 * x_next_year
        =>:
            x = 9
    prove:
        =:
            uncle_next_year
            uncle + 1
            x + 20 + 1
            x + 21
        =:
            uncle_next_year
            3 * x_next_year
            3 * (x + 1)
            3 * x + 3
        x + 21 = 3 * x + 3
        $sub_same_preserves_eq(x + 21, 3 * x + 3, x)
        (x + 21) - x = (3 * x + 3) - x
        =:
            (x + 21) - x
            21
        =:
            (3 * x + 3) - x
            2 * x + 3
        21 = 2 * x + 3
        $sub_same_preserves_eq(21, 2 * x + 3, 3)
        21 - 3 = (2 * x + 3) - 3
        =:
            21 - 3
            18
        =:
            (2 * x + 3) - 3
            2 * x
        18 = 2 * x
        $div_same_preserves_eq(18, 2 * x, 2)
        18 / 2 = (2 * x) / 2
        =:
            x
            (2 * x) / 2
            18 / 2
            9
        x = 9

title: Math23k_8576
description: Question:两组同学跳绳，第一组有25人，平均每人跳80下；第二组有20人，平均每人比两组同学跳的平均数多5下，两组同学平均每人跳几下？

        people1 = 25
        people2 = 20
        total1 = people1 * 80
        total2 = people2 * (avg + 5)
        total = total1 + total2
        total_people = people1 + people2
        avg = total / total_people
        =>:
            avg = 84
    prove:
        total1 = 25 * 80 = 2000
        total2 = 20 * (avg + 5) = 20 * avg + 100
        total = 2000 + (20 * avg + 100) = 20 * avg + 2100

        25 * avg = 2100
        avg = 2100 / 25 = 84

title: Math23k_3317

title: Math23k_13189

title: Math23k_19505

        =>:
            v = 70

        distance_truck = v * (4 / 5)

        v = 280 / 4 = 70

title: Math23k_6873
description: Question:妈妈加工一批玩具，白天加工了(2/5)，晚上加班完成了45个，正好完成了任务的50%，这批玩具一共有多少个？

title: Math23k_14936

title: Math23k_3058

        =>:

title: Math23k_21988
description: Question:张叔叔骑自行车过一道立交桥，上桥速度是每小时8千米，下桥速度是每小时12千米，而且上桥与下桥所经过的路程相等，中间也没有停顿．张叔叔骑车过这座桥的平均速度=？
full litex:
claim:
    forall up_speed, down_speed, d, t_up, t_down, total_dist, total_time, frac1, frac2, sumfrac, avg_speed R:
        up_speed = 8
        down_speed = 12
        d > 0
        t_up = d / up_speed
        t_down = d / down_speed
        total_dist = d + d
        total_time = t_up + t_down
        frac1 = 1/8
        frac2 = 1/12
        sumfrac = frac1 + frac2
        total_time != 0
        avg_speed = total_dist / total_time
        =>:
            avg_speed = 48/5
    prove:
        t_up = d / 8
        t_down = d / 12
        total_dist = d + d
        total_time = d / 8 + d / 12
        sumfrac = 1/8 + 1/12
        1/8 = 3/24
        1/12 = 2/24
        sumfrac = 3/24 + 2/24
        sumfrac = 5/24
        total_time = d * sumfrac
        total_time = d * (5/24)
        total_dist = 2 * d
        avg_speed = total_dist / total_time
        avg_speed = (2 * d) / (d * (5/24))
        (2 * d) / (d * (5/24)) = (2 / (5/24)) * (d / d)
        d / d = 1
        2 / (5/24) = (2 * 24) / 5
        (2 * 24) / 5 = 48/5
        avg_speed = 48/5

        probability = red_balls / total_balls

title: Math23k_19792
description: Question:姜堰与上海的公路长252千米，甲乙两辆大客同时从姜堰驶往上海，甲客车每小时行80千米，0.8小时后两车相距16千米．乙客车每小时至少行多少千米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall speed_a, time, distance_a, distance_b, speed_b R:
        speed_a = 80
        time = 0.8
        distance_a = speed_a * time
        distance_a - 0.8 * speed_b = 16
        =>:
            speed_b = 60
    prove:
        distance_a = 80 * 0.8 = 64
        64 - 0.8 * speed_b = 16
        0.8 * speed_b = 64 - 16 = 48
        speed_b = 48 / 0.8 = 60

title: Math23k_9825
description: Question:小明第一天看了一本书的(4/11)，第二天看的相当于第一天的(3/2)，小明两天有没有看完这本书？为什么？
full litex:
claim:
    forall first_day, second_day, total R:
        first_day = 4 / 11
        second_day = (3 / 2) * first_day
        total = first_day + second_day
        =>:
            total = 10 / 11
    prove:
        second_day = (3 / 2) * (4 / 11) = (3 * 4) / (2 * 11) = 12 / 22 = 6 / 11
        total = (4 / 11) + (6 / 11) = 10 / 11

title: Math23k_12197
description: Question:一项工程，预计15个工人每天做4个小时，18天可以完成．为了赶工期，增加3人并且每天工作时间增加1小时，可以提前几天完工．
full litex:
claim:
    forall workers_initial, hours_initial, days_initial, workers_new, hours_new, total_work, days_new, days_saved R:
        workers_initial = 15
        hours_initial = 4
        days_initial = 18
        total_work = workers_initial * hours_initial * days_initial
        workers_new = workers_initial + 3
        hours_new = hours_initial + 1
        days_new = total_work / (workers_new * hours_new)
        days_saved = days_initial - days_new
        =>:
            days_saved = 6
    prove:
        total_work = 15 * 4 * 18 = 1080
        workers_new = 15 + 3 = 18
        hours_new = 4 + 1 = 5
        days_new = 1080 / (18 * 5) = 1080 / 90 = 12
        days_saved = 18 - 12 = 6

title: Math23k_12567
description: Question:一个修路队，第一天修了全长的(2/15)，第二天修了第一天的(1/2)，这时还有1800米就到这条路的中点处，求这条路有多长？
full litex:
claim:
    forall L, first_day, second_day, total_two_days, half_L, remaining_to_mid R:
        first_day = (2/15) * L
        second_day = (1/2) * first_day
        total_two_days = first_day + second_day
        half_L = L / 2
        remaining_to_mid = half_L - total_two_days
        remaining_to_mid = 1800
        =>:
            L = 6000
    prove:
        first_day = (2/15) * L
        second_day = (1/2) * first_day
        second_day = (1/2) * ((2/15) * L)
        second_day = (1/15) * L
        total_two_days = first_day + second_day
        total_two_days = (2/15) * L + (1/15) * L
        total_two_days = (3/15) * L
        total_two_days = (1/5) * L
        half_L = L / 2
        remaining_to_mid = half_L - total_two_days
        remaining_to_mid = L / 2 - (1/5) * L
        =:
            remaining_to_mid
            L / 2 - (1/5) * L
            (5 * L) / 10 - (2 * L) / 10
            (3 * L) / 10
        remaining_to_mid = 1800
        10 * remaining_to_mid = 10 * 1800
        10 * remaining_to_mid = 18000
        remaining_to_mid = (3 * L) / 10
        10 * remaining_to_mid = 3 * L
        3 * L = 18000
        L = 18000 / 3
        L = 6000

title: Math23k_1534
description: Question:有一堆糖果，其中奶糖占45%，再放入16块水果糖后，奶糖就只占25%．那么，这堆糖中有奶糖多少块．

    forall x, milk, total_after R:
        milk = 0.45 * x
        total_after = x + 16
        milk = 0.25 * total_after
        =>:
            milk = 9
    prove:
        milk = 0.25 * (x + 16) = 0.25 * x + 0.25 * 16 = 0.25 * x + 4
        milk = 0.45 * x
        0.45 * x = 0.25 * x + 4
        0.45 * x - 0.25 * x = 4

title: Math23k_7296
description: Question:一辆公共汽车上有一些乘客，到文化路站时，有(2/5)的人下车，又上来了30人，这时车上的乘客正好是原来的(6/5)．车上原有乘客多少人？

        distance = 32 * t + 30 * t
        =>:

description: Question:甲骑自行车追赶前面步行的乙，乙的速度是每分钟60米，甲的速度是每分钟150米．甲出发8分钟追上了乙，那么乙比甲早出发多少分钟．
full litex:
claim:
    forall distance_m, speed_m, speed_e, time_m, time_e R:
        speed_m = 150
        speed_e = 60
        time_m = 8
        distance_m = speed_m * time_m
        distance_m = speed_e * (time_e + time_m)
        =>:
            time_e = 12
    prove:
        distance_m = 150 * 8 = 1200
        1200 = 60 * (time_e + 8)
        1200 = 60 * time_e + 480
        1200 - 480 = 60 * time_e
        720 = 60 * time_e

title: Math23k_21347
description: Question:六年级有学生112人，其中男生占(5/8)，后来又转来女生若干人，这时男生和女生人数的比是5：4．现在女生有多少人？
full litex:
prop ratio(a R, b R, m R, n R)
know forall a, b, m, n R => $ratio(a, b, m, n) <=> n * a = m * b

claim:
    forall total, male_ratio, initial_male, initial_female, x, now_female R:
        total = 112
        male_ratio = 5/8
        initial_male = total * male_ratio
        initial_female = total - initial_male
        now_female = initial_female + x
        $ratio(initial_male, now_female, 5, 4)
        =>:
            now_female = 56
    prove:
        initial_male = 112 * (5/8)
        initial_male = 70

        initial_female = 112 - 70
        initial_female = 42

        now_female = 42 + x

        4 * initial_male = 5 * now_female
        4 * 70 = 5 * now_female
        280 = 5 * now_female

        now_female = 42 + x
        280 = 5 * (42 + x)
        280 = 5 * 42 + 5 * x
        5 * 42 = 210
        280 = 210 + 5 * x
        280 - 210 = 5 * x
        70 = 5 * x
        x = 70 / 5
        x = 14

        now_female = 42 + 14
        now_female = 56

title: Math23k_1823
description: Question:一堆货物，第一天运走了总数的(1/4)，第二天运走了总数的(2/5)还剩35吨．第一天运走多少吨？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, day1, day2, remaining R:
        remaining = 35
        day1 = (1 / 4) * total
        day2 = (2 / 5) * total
        remaining = total - (day1 + day2)
        =>:
            day1 = 25
    prove:
        day1 + day2 = (1 / 4) * total + (2 / 5) * total
        (1 / 4) = 5 / 20
        (2 / 5) = 8 / 20
        day1 + day2 = (5 / 20 + 8 / 20) * total = (13 / 20) * total
        remaining = total - (13 / 20) * total = (7 / 20) * total
        (7 / 20) * total = 35
        total = 35 * (20 / 7) = 100
        day1 = (1 / 4) * 100 = 25

title: Math23k_22281
description: Question:一列火车32小时共行驶2481千米，已知这列火车先以每小时75千米的速度行驶了11小时，又以80千米的速度行驶了9小时，求其余时间的行驶速度．
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_distance, total_time, speed1, time1, speed2, time2, remaining_distance, remaining_time, remaining_speed R:
        total_distance = 2481
        total_time = 32
        speed1 = 75
        time1 = 11
        speed2 = 80
        time2 = 9
        remaining_distance = total_distance - (speed1 * time1 + speed2 * time2)
        remaining_time = total_time - (time1 + time2)
        remaining_speed = remaining_distance / remaining_time
        =>:
            remaining_speed = 78
    prove:
        speed1 * time1 = 75 * 11 = 825
        speed2 * time2 = 80 * 9 = 720

        remaining_speed = 936 / 12 = 78

title: Math23k_16297
description: Question:一次数学竞赛，测试题只有两道，结果全班只有17人全对，做对第二道题的有26人，做错第一道题的共33人，两题都错的有多少人．
full litex:
claim:
    forall n, A, Ac, B, AandB, AunionB, x N_pos:
        Ac = 33
        B = 26
        AandB = 17
        A = n - Ac
        AunionB = A + B - AandB
        n = AunionB + x
        =>:
            x = 24
    prove:
        A = n - 33
        AunionB = A + 26 - 17
        =:
            A + 26 - 17
            A + 9
        AunionB = A + 9
        AunionB = (n - 33) + 9
        =:
            (n - 33) + 9
            n - 24
        AunionB = n - 24
        n = (n - 24) + x
        n - n = ((n - 24) + x) - n
        =:
            n - n
            0
        0 = ((n - 24) + x) - n
        =:
            ((n - 24) + x) - n
            x - 24
        0 = x - 24
        0 + 24 = (x - 24) + 24
        =:
            0 + 24
            24
        =:
            (x - 24) + 24
            x
        =:
            24
            x
        x = 24

title: Math23k_19249
description: Question:一个比的前项是(1/2)比值是(2/5)，这个比的后项=．
full litex:
know @ratio_cross_multiply(a, x, num, den R):
    x != 0
    den != 0
    a / x = num / den
    =>:
        a * den = num * x

claim:
    forall a, x, num, den R:
        a = 1/2
        num = 2
        den = 5
        x != 0
        den != 0
        a / x = num / den
        =>:
            x = 5/4
    prove:
        $ratio_cross_multiply(a, x, num, den)
        a * den = num * x
        1/2 * 5 = 2 * x
        5/2 = 2 * x
        (5/2) / 2 = (2 * x) / 2
        (5/2) / 2 = x
        5/4 = x
        x = 5/4

title: Math23k_16833
description: Question:客车从甲地开往乙地，货车从乙地开往甲地，两车同时相向开出，12小时相遇．相遇后，客车又行了8小时到达乙地．相遇后，货车再行几小时到达甲地？
full litex:
know @pos_implies_nonzero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        x != 0

claim:
    forall v1, v2, D, t, remaining R:
        v1 > 0
        v2 > 0
        12 * v1 + 12 * v2 = D
        8 * v1 = D - 12 * v1
        remaining = D - 12 * v2
        t = remaining / v2
        =>:
            t = 18
    prove:
        8 * v1 + 12 * v1 = D
        20 * v1 = D
        D = 20 * v1

        12 * v1 + 12 * v2 = D
        12 * v1 + 12 * v2 = 20 * v1
        12 * v2 = 20 * v1 - 12 * v1
        12 * v2 = 8 * v1
        v2 = (8 * v1) / 12
        v2 = (2 * v1) / 3

        remaining = D - 12 * v2
        remaining = 20 * v1 - 12 * ((2 * v1) / 3)
        12 * ((2 * v1) / 3) = 8 * v1
        remaining = 20 * v1 - 8 * v1
        remaining = 12 * v1

        $pos_implies_nonzero(v2)
        =:
            t
            remaining / v2
            (12 * v1) / ((2 * v1) / 3)
            12 / (2/3)
            12 * (3/2)
            18

title: Math23k_4406
description: Question:某工厂生产一批零件，经检验已有84个不合格，至少要有多少个合格，才能确保合格率达到98%．
full litex:
know @pass_rate_exact(good N_pos, total N_pos, pass_ratio R):
    total = good + 84
    pass_ratio = 49 / 50
    =>:
        50 * good = 49 * total

claim:
    forall good, total N_pos, pass_ratio R:
        total = good + 84
        pass_ratio = 49 / 50
        =>:
            good = 4116
    prove:
        total = good + 84
        pass_ratio = 49 / 50
        $pass_rate_exact(good, total, pass_ratio)
        50 * good = 49 * total
        50 * good = 49 * (good + 84)
        50 * good = 49 * good + 49 * 84
        50 * good - 49 * good = 49 * 84
        1 * good = 49 * 84
        1 * good = good
        =:
            49 * 84
            (50 - 1) * 84
            50 * 84 - 1 * 84
        50 * 84 = 4200
        1 * 84 = 84
        50 * 84 - 1 * 84 = 4200 - 84
        4200 - 84 = 4116
        49 * 84 = 4116
        good = 4116

title: Math23k_14645
description: Question:操场上有108名同学在锻炼身体，其中女生占(2/9)，后来又来了几名女生，使女生人数和男生人数的比是3：7，后来来了几名女生？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_initial, girls_initial, boys, x R:
        total_initial = 108
        girls_initial = total_initial * (2/9)
        boys = total_initial - girls_initial
        (girls_initial + x) / boys = 3/7
        =>:
            x = 12
    prove:
        girls_initial = 108 * (2/9) = 24
        boys = 108 - 24 = 84
        7 * (24 + x) = 3 * 84
        3 * 84 = 252
        7 * (24 + x) = 252
        7 * 24 + 7 * x = 252
        168 + 7 * x = 252
        7 * x = 252 - 168
        7 * x = 84
        x = 84 / 7
        x = 12

title: Math23k_17081
description: Question:仓库里有一批玩具，运出这批玩具数量的(3/7)后，又运进20万件，这时仓库里的玩具比原来还多5万件．仓库原来有玩具多少万件？
full litex:
know @add_both_sides(u, v, t R):
    u = v
    =>:
        u + t = v + t

know @solve_add_left(a, b, c R):
    a + b = c
    =>:
        b = c - a

know @mul_both_sides(u, v, t R):
    u = v
    =>:
        u * t = v * t

claim:
    forall x, remaining, after_in R:
        remaining = x - (3/7) * x
        remaining = (4/7) * x
        after_in = remaining + 20
        after_in = x + 5
        =>:
            x = 35
    prove:
        after_in = remaining + 20
        remaining = (4/7) * x
        after_in = ((4/7) * x) + 20

        after_in = x + 5
        ((4/7) * x) + 20 = x + 5

        $add_both_sides(((4/7) * x) + 20, x + 5, -5)
        (((4/7) * x) + 20) + (-5) = (x + 5) + (-5)

        =:
            (((4/7) * x) + 20) + (-5)
            ((4/7) * x) + 15
        =:
            (x + 5) + (-5)
            x

        ((4/7) * x) + 15 = x

        $solve_add_left(((4/7) * x), 15, x)
        15 = x - ((4/7) * x)

        =:
            x - ((4/7) * x)
            (3/7) * x

        $mul_both_sides(15, (3/7) * x, (7/3))
        15 * (7/3) = ((3/7) * x) * (7/3)

        =:
            ((3/7) * x) * (7/3)
            ((3/7) * (7/3)) * x
            1 * x
            x

        15 * (7/3) = x
        =:
            15 * (7/3)
            35
        35 = x
        x = 35

title: Math23k_8051
description: Question:小华家到学校有上坡路和小坡路，没有平路，共2.4千米．小华每天上学要走1.1小时．已知小华上坡时每小时走2千米，下坡时每小时走3千米．那么小华放学回家要走多少小时．
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, y, total_distance, t_school, up_speed, down_speed, time_back R:
        total_distance = 2.4
        t_school = 1.1
        up_speed = 2
        down_speed = 3
        x + y = total_distance
        x / up_speed + y / down_speed = t_school
        time_back = y / up_speed + x / down_speed
        =>:
            time_back = 0.9
    prove:
        y = total_distance - x
        =:
            6 * (x / up_speed + y / down_speed)
            6 * t_school
            3 * x + 2 * y
            6.6
        3 * x + 2 * y = 6.6
        3 * x + 2 * (2.4 - x) = 6.6
        3 * x + 4.8 - 2 * x = 6.6
        x + 4.8 = 6.6
        x = 6.6 - 4.8
        x = 1.8
        y = 2.4 - 1.8
        y = 0.6
        time_back = y / up_speed + x / down_speed
        time_back = 0.6 / 2 + 1.8 / 3
        time_back = 0.3 + 0.6
        time_back = 0.9

title: Math23k_16650

        days_teamB = 5

        total_hours_teamB = hours_per_day_teamB * days_teamB
        efficiency_teamA = 1 / total_hours_teamA

title: Math23k_17451
description: Question:李明看一本书故事书，第一天看了(1/3)，第二天看了全书的(2/5)，还剩24页没有看，这本书共有多少页？

    forall total_pages, day1_fraction, day2_fraction, remaining_pages R:
        day1_fraction = 1 / 3
        day2_fraction = 2 / 5
        remaining_pages = 24
        total_pages = (day1_fraction + day2_fraction) * total_pages + remaining_pages
        =>:
            total_pages = 90
    prove:
        day1_fraction = 1 / 3 = 5 / 15
        day2_fraction = 2 / 5 = 6 / 15
        total_pages = (5 / 15 + 6 / 15) * total_pages + 24

title: Math23k_15409
description: Question:一堆糖果共200块，其中奶糖占这堆糖果的40%，再加入多少块奶糖后，奶糖占现有糖果60%．
full litex:
know @equal_subtract_same(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - c = b - c

know @solve_linear_equation(a, b, x R):
    a != 0
    a * x + b = 0
    =>:
        x = -b / a

claim:
    forall total0, milk_ratio0, milk0, add, total1, milk1, ratio1 R:
        total0 = 200
        milk_ratio0 = 0.4
        ratio1 = 0.6
        milk0 = total0 * milk_ratio0
        total1 = total0 + add
        milk1 = milk0 + add
        milk1 = ratio1 * total1
        =>:
            add = 100
    prove:
        milk0 = 200 * 0.4
        milk0 = 80

        total1 = 200 + add
        milk1 = 80 + add

        80 + add = 0.6 * (200 + add)
        0.6 * (200 + add) = 0.6 * 200 + 0.6 * add
        0.6 * 200 = 120
        0.6 * (200 + add) = 120 + 0.6 * add
        80 + add = 120 + 0.6 * add

        $equal_subtract_same(80 + add, 120 + 0.6 * add, 0.6 * add)
        80 + add - 0.6 * add = 120 + 0.6 * add - 0.6 * add
        120 + 0.6 * add - 0.6 * add = 120
        80 + add - 0.6 * add = 120

        $equal_subtract_same(80 + add - 0.6 * add, 120, 80)
        80 + add - 0.6 * add - 80 = 120 - 80
        120 - 80 = 40
        80 + add - 0.6 * add - 80 = 40
        =:
            80 + add - 0.6 * add - 80
            add - 0.6 * add
        add - 0.6 * add = 40

        =:
            add - 0.6 * add
            (1 - 0.6) * add
            0.4 * add
        0.4 * add = 40

        $equal_subtract_same(0.4 * add, 40, 40)
        0.4 * add - 40 = 40 - 40
        40 - 40 = 0
        0.4 * add - 40 = 0

        $solve_linear_equation(0.4, -40, add)
        add = -(-40) / 0.4
        =:
            -(-40)
            40
        add = 40 / 0.4
        add = 100

title: Math23k_15968
description: Question:兴趣小组有女生10人，男生12人，还要录取女生多少人才能使女生占舞蹈队总人数的(3/5)．
full litex:
know @cross_multiply_pos(a, b, c, d R):
    b > 0
    d > 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

know @subtract_both_sides(a, b, t R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - t = b - t

know @divide_both_sides_nonzero(a, b, t R):
    t != 0
    a * t = b
    =>:
        a = b / t

claim:
    forall girls_now, boys_now, x, girls_new, total, ratio R:
        girls_now = 10
        boys_now = 12
        girls_new = girls_now + x
        total = girls_new + boys_now
        ratio = girls_new / total
        ratio = 3 / 5
        total > 0
        5 > 0
        2 != 0
        =>:
            x = 8
    prove:
        $cross_multiply_pos(girls_new, total, 3, 5)
        girls_new * 5 = 3 * total
        =:
            girls_new * 5
            5 * girls_new
        girls_new = girls_now + x
        girls_now = 10
        =:
            5 * girls_new
            5 * (10 + x)
            50 + 5 * x
        total = girls_new + boys_now
        boys_now = 12
        total = (10 + x) + 12
        total = 22 + x
        =:
            3 * total
            3 * (22 + x)
            66 + 3 * x
        50 + 5 * x = 66 + 3 * x
        $subtract_both_sides(50 + 5 * x, 66 + 3 * x, 3 * x)
        (50 + 5 * x) - 3 * x = (66 + 3 * x) - 3 * x
        =:
            (50 + 5 * x) - 3 * x
            50 + 2 * x
        =:
            (66 + 3 * x) - 3 * x
            66
        50 + 2 * x = 66
        $subtract_both_sides(50 + 2 * x, 66, 50)
        (50 + 2 * x) - 50 = 66 - 50
        =:
            (50 + 2 * x) - 50
            2 * x
        66 - 50 = 16
        2 * x = 16
        $divide_both_sides_nonzero(x, 16, 2)
        x = 16 / 2
        x = 8

title: Math23k_19334
description: Question:新华书店新到一批儿童读物，第一天卖出总数的(3/8)，第二天卖出总数的40%，还余下450本，这一批儿童读物一共有多少本？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, remaining R:
        total - ((3 / 8) * total + 0.4 * total) = remaining
        remaining = 450
        =>:
            total = 2000
    prove:
        (3 / 8) * total = (15 / 40) * total
        0.4 * total = (16 / 40) * total
        (3 / 8) * total + 0.4 * total = (15 / 40) * total + (16 / 40) * total = (31 / 40) * total
        total - (31 / 40) * total = 450
        total * (1 - 31 / 40) = 450
        total * (9 / 40) = 450
        total = 450 / (9 / 40)
        total = 450 * (40 / 9)
        total = 2000

title: Math23k_5088
description: Question:王强读一本故事书，已经读了80页，已读页数和未读页数的比是4：5．这本故事书有多少页？
full litex:
know @ratio_cross_multiply(n1, d1, n2, d2 R):
    d1 != 0
    d2 != 0
    n1 / d1 = n2 / d2
    =>:
        n1 * d2 = n2 * d1

claim:
    forall total, read, unread, a, b R:
        read = 80
        a = 4
        b = 5
        unread = total - read
        unread != 0
        b != 0
        read / unread = a / b
        =>:
            total = 180
    prove:
        $ratio_cross_multiply(read, unread, a, b)
        read * b = a * unread
        80 * 5 = 4 * unread
        unread = total - read
        read = 80
        total - read = total - 80
        unread = total - 80
        4 * unread = 4 * (total - 80)
        80 * 5 = 4 * (total - 80)
        80 * 5 = 400
        4 * (total - 80) = 4 * total - 4 * 80
        4 * 80 = 320
        400 = 4 * total - 320
        400 + 320 = 4 * total
        720 = 4 * total
        total = 720 / 4
        total = 180

title: Math23k_3483
description: Question:一桶油，第一次用去它的(1/6)，第二次用去它的(1/4)．如果第3次用去3千克正好用完，那么第一次用去多少千克？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, first_use, second_use, third_use R:
        first_use = 1 / 6 * x
        second_use = 1 / 4 * x
        third_use = 3
        first_use + second_use + third_use = x
        =>:
            first_use = 6 / 7
    prove:
        first_use + second_use = (1 / 6) * x + (1 / 4) * x
        (1 / 6) * x + (1 / 4) * x = (2 / 12) * x + (3 / 12) * x = (5 / 12) * x
        (5 / 12) * x + 3 = x
        3 = x - (5 / 12) * x
        3 = (12 / 12) * x - (5 / 12) * x = (7 / 12) * x
        x = 3 * (12 / 7) = 36 / 7
        first_use = (1 / 6) * (36 / 7) = 36 / 42 = 6 / 7

title: Math23k_4056

title: Math23k_11539
description: Question:现有浓度为20%的糖水200克，要得到浓度为16%的糖水，需加水多少克．
full litex:
claim:
    forall initial_mass, initial_concentration, sugar, water, total_mass, final_concentration R:
        initial_mass = 200
        initial_concentration = 0.20
        sugar = initial_mass * initial_concentration
        final_concentration = 0.16
        total_mass = initial_mass + water
        sugar = final_concentration * total_mass
        =>:
            water = 50
    prove:
        sugar = 200 * 0.20 = 40
        40 = 0.16 * (200 + water)
        40 = 0.16 * 200 + 0.16 * water
        40 = 32 + 0.16 * water
        40 - 32 = 0.16 * water
        8 = 0.16 * water
        water = 8 / 0.16 = 50

title: Math23k_8608
description: Question:工程队修一条水渠，第一天修了全长的(1/3)，第二天修了30米，两天共修了全长的(1/2)，这条水渠全长多少米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall L, day1, day2, total, multiplier R:
        day1 = L / 3
        day2 = 30
        total = L / 2
        multiplier = 6
        day1 + day2 = total
        =>:
            L = 180
    prove:
        (L / 3) + 30 = total

        (L / 3) + 30 = L / 2

        multiplier * ((L / 3) + 30) = multiplier * (L / 2)

        (multiplier * (L / 3)) + (multiplier * 30) = multiplier * (L / 2)

        (6 * (L / 3)) + (6 * 30) = multiplier * (L / 2)

        (6 * (L / 3)) + (6 * 30) = 6 * (L / 2)

        (2 * L) + 180 = 6 * (L / 2)

        (2 * L) + 180 = 3 * L

        ((2 * L) + 180) - (2 * L) = (3 * L) - (2 * L)

        =:
            ((2 * L) + 180) - (2 * L)
            (2 * L) - (2 * L) + 180
            0 + 180
            180

        =:
            (3 * L) - (2 * L)
            (3 - 2) * L
            1 * L
            L

        180 = L

title: Math23k_2116
description: Question:化(32/7)为带分数=．
full litex:
claim:
    forall numerator, denominator, quotient, remainder, mixed_int, frac_num, frac_den, mixed_sum R:
        numerator = 32
        denominator = 7
        quotient = 4
        remainder = 4
        mixed_int = quotient
        frac_den = denominator
        frac_num = remainder
        mixed_sum = mixed_int + frac_num / frac_den
        =>:
            numerator / denominator = mixed_sum
    prove:
        numerator = 32
        denominator = 7
        quotient = 4
        remainder = 4

        mixed_int = quotient
        mixed_int = 4

        frac_den = denominator
        frac_den = 7

        frac_num = remainder
        frac_num = 4

        mixed_sum = mixed_int + frac_num / frac_den
        =:
            mixed_sum
            4 + 4 / 7
            (4 * 7) / 7 + 4 / 7
            28 / 7 + 4 / 7
            (28 + 4) / 7
            32 / 7

        numerator / denominator = 32 / 7
        numerator / denominator = mixed_sum

title: Math23k_15165

title: Math23k_9679
description: Question:龙博士开车到“彩色城”购买玩具，因途中一路段正在抢修而将车速降低了(1/5)．那么，龙博士在路上的时间增加了多少？
full litex:
know @pos_not_zero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        not x = 0
know @pos_mul(x, y R):
    x > 0
    y > 0
    =>:
        x * y > 0
know @pos_div(x, y R):
    x > 0
    y > 0
    =>:
        x / y > 0
know @ratio_minus_one(x, y R):
    not y = 0
    =>:
        (x - y) / y = x / y - 1
know @ratio_same_numerator(a, b, c R):
    not b = 0
    not c = 0
    =>:
        (a / b) / (a / c) = c / b
know @cancel_common_factor(x, k R):
    x > 0
    k > 0
    =>:
        x / (k * x) = 1 / k

claim:
    forall v, d, t, v_new, t_new, increase_ratio, ratio_tt R:
        v > 0
        d > 0
        t = d / v
        v_new = v - v / 5
        t_new = d / v_new
        increase_ratio = (t_new - t) / t
        ratio_tt = t_new / t
        =>:
            increase_ratio = 1/4
    prove:
        $pos_not_zero(v)

        v_new = v - v / 5
        v_new = v * (1 - 1/5)
        v_new = v * (4/5)
        v_new = (4/5) * v

        4/5 > 0
        $pos_mul(4/5, v)
        ((4/5) * v) > 0
        v_new > 0
        $pos_not_zero(v_new)

        t = d / v
        t_new = d / v_new

        $pos_div(d, v)
        (d / v) > 0
        t > 0
        $pos_not_zero(t)

        increase_ratio = (t_new - t) / t
        $ratio_minus_one(t_new, t)
        increase_ratio = t_new / t - 1

        ratio_tt = t_new / t
        ratio_tt = (d / v_new) / (d / v)
        $ratio_same_numerator(d, v_new, v)
        ratio_tt = v / v_new
        ratio_tt = v / ((4/5) * v)
        $cancel_common_factor(v, 4/5)
        v / ((4/5) * v) = 1 / (4/5)
        ratio_tt = 1 / (4/5)
        ratio_tt = 5/4

        increase_ratio = ratio_tt - 1
        increase_ratio = 5/4 - 1
        increase_ratio = 1/4

title: Math23k_15404
description: Question:商店购进苹果、梨共54千克，苹果占(2/9)．后来又买进一些苹果，这时苹果占两种水果总重量的40%，后来买进的苹果=多少千克？
full litex:
know @div_to_mul(a, b, c R):
    a / b = c
    =>:
        a = b * c

claim:
    forall total_initial, apple_ratio, apple_initial, x, total_after, apple_after, ratio_after R:
        total_initial = 54
        apple_ratio = 2/9
        apple_initial = total_initial * apple_ratio
        ratio_after = 0.4
        total_after = total_initial + x
        apple_after = apple_initial + x
        apple_after / total_after = ratio_after
        =>:
            x = 16
    prove:
        apple_initial = 54 * (2/9)
        apple_initial = 12

        total_after = 54 + x
        apple_after = 12 + x

        $div_to_mul(apple_after, total_after, ratio_after)
        apple_after = total_after * ratio_after

        12 + x = (54 + x) * 0.4
        12 + x = 0.4 * (54 + x)
        12 + x = 0.4 * 54 + 0.4 * x
        0.4 * 54 = 21.6
        12 + x = 21.6 + 0.4 * x

        12 + x - 0.4 * x = 21.6
        x - 0.4 * x = 0.6 * x
        12 + 0.6 * x = 21.6

        0.6 * x = 21.6 - 12
        21.6 - 12 = 9.6
        0.6 * x = 9.6

        (0.6 * x) / 0.6 = 9.6 / 0.6
        x = 9.6 / 0.6
        x = 16

title: Math23k_9486
description: Question:人造地球卫星的速度相当于宇宙飞船速度的(40/57)．如果人造地球卫星每秒飞行8千米，那么宇宙飞船每秒飞行多少千米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall satellite_speed, spaceship_speed R:
        satellite_speed = 8
        satellite_speed = 40 / 57 * spaceship_speed
        =>:
            spaceship_speed = 11.4
    prove:
        spaceship_speed = 8 / (40 / 57) = 8 * (57 / 40) = 11.4

title: Math23k_14617
description: Question:一本故事书560页，第一周看了全书的(2/7)，第二周看了全书的(3/8)，还剩多少页没看？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_pages, first_week, second_week, remaining_pages R:
        total_pages = 560
        first_week = total_pages * (2 / 7)
        second_week = total_pages * (3 / 8)
        remaining_pages = total_pages - (first_week + second_week)
        =>:
            remaining_pages = 190
    prove:
        first_week = 560 * (2 / 7) = 160
        second_week = 560 * (3 / 8) = 210
        first_week + second_week = 160 + 210 = 370
        remaining_pages = 560 - 370 = 190

title: Math23k_1678
description: Question:水果店购进苹果1000千克，运输途中碰坏了一些，没有碰坏的苹果卖完后，利润率为40%，碰坏的苹果只能降低出售，亏了60%，最后结算时发现总的利润为32%，问：碰坏多少千克苹果．
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, total, profit_good, loss_bad, total_profit R:
        total = 1000
        profit_good = 0.4 * (total - x)
        loss_bad = 0.6 * x
        total_profit = 0.32 * total
        profit_good - loss_bad = total_profit
        =>:
            x = 80
    prove:
        profit_good = 0.4 * (1000 - x)
        loss_bad = 0.6 * x
        total_profit = 0.32 * 1000 = 320
        0.4 * (1000 - x) - 0.6 * x = 320
        400 - 0.4 * x - 0.6 * x = 320
        400 - x = 320
        x = 400 - 320 = 80

title: Math23k_3120
description: Question:新华书店运到一批图书，第一天卖出这批图书的45%，第二天卖出这批图书的35%，已知两天共卖出640本，这批图书共多少本？

        sold_day1 = 0.45 * total_books
        sold_day2 = 0.35 * total_books
        total_sold = sold_day1 + sold_day2
        total_sold = 640
        =>:
            total_books = 800
    prove:
        total_sold = 0.45 * total_books + 0.35 * total_books = 0.80 * total_books
        0.80 * total_books = 640
        total_books = 640 / 0.80 = 800

title: Math23k_12919
description: Question:40个工人用30小时可以完成一批零件．若有些工人临时请假，余下的工人要用50小时才能完成这批零件．有多少人请假？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_workers, hours_initial, hours_later, workers_absent R:
        total_workers = 40
        hours_initial = 30
        hours_later = 50
        total_workers * hours_initial = (total_workers - workers_absent) * hours_later
        =>:
            workers_absent = 16
    prove:
        total_workers * hours_initial = 40 * 30 = 1200
        (total_workers - workers_absent) * hours_later = (40 - workers_absent) * 50
        1200 = (40 - workers_absent) * 50
        40 - workers_absent = 1200 / 50 = 24
        workers_absent = 40 - 24 = 16

title: Math23k_16953
description: Question:一根绳子剪去20%后又接上5米，结果比原来短(3/20)，现在绳子长多少米？（不计接头）
full litex:
claim:
    forall original, after_cut, after_add, short_ratio R:
        short_ratio = 3/20
        after_cut = original * (1 - 0.2)
        after_add = after_cut + 5
        after_add = original * (1 - short_ratio)
        =>:
            after_add = 85
    prove:
        after_add = original * (1 - 3/20) = original * 17/20
        after_add = 0.8 * original + 5
        0.8 * original + 5 = 17/20 * original
        0.8 * original - 17/20 * original = -5
        16/20 * original - 17/20 * original = -5
        -1/20 * original = -5
        original = (-5) * (-20) = 100
        after_add = 0.8 * 100 + 5 = 80 + 5 = 85

title: Math23k_19983
description: Question:春季运动会上，六年级少先队为同学们准备了10千克糖水，其中糖和水的比是1：26，因天气炎热需加量，先补充了52千克水．再加多少千克糖，才能保持原来的浓度？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total0, sugar_ratio, water_ratio, ratio_sum, sugar0, add_water, total_after_water, add_sugar, new_total R:
        total0 = 10
        sugar_ratio = 1
        water_ratio = 26
        ratio_sum = sugar_ratio + water_ratio
        sugar0 = total0 / ratio_sum
        add_water = 52
        total_after_water = total0 + add_water
        new_total = total_after_water + add_sugar
        27 * (sugar0 + add_sugar) = new_total
        =>:
            add_sugar = 2
    prove:
        ratio_sum = 1 + 26
        ratio_sum = 27

        sugar0 = 10 / 27

        total_after_water = 10 + 52
        total_after_water = 62

        new_total = 62 + add_sugar

        27 * (sugar0 + add_sugar) = new_total
        27 * (10 / 27 + add_sugar) = 62 + add_sugar

        =:
            27 * (10 / 27 + add_sugar)
            27 * (10 / 27) + 27 * add_sugar
        27 * (10 / 27) + 27 * add_sugar = 62 + add_sugar

        =:
            27 * (10 / 27)
            10
        10 + 27 * add_sugar = 62 + add_sugar

        (10 + 27 * add_sugar) - add_sugar = (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar

        =:
            (10 + 27 * add_sugar) - add_sugar
            10 + (27 * add_sugar - add_sugar)
        10 + (27 * add_sugar - add_sugar) = (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar

        =:
            (27 * add_sugar - add_sugar)
            26 * add_sugar
        10 + 26 * add_sugar = (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar

        =:
            (62 + add_sugar) - add_sugar
            62 + (add_sugar - add_sugar)
        10 + 26 * add_sugar = 62 + (add_sugar - add_sugar)

        =:
            add_sugar - add_sugar
            0
        10 + 26 * add_sugar = 62

        (10 + 26 * add_sugar) - 10 = 62 - 10

        =:
            (10 + 26 * add_sugar) - 10
            26 * add_sugar
        26 * add_sugar = 62 - 10

        =:
            62 - 10
            52
        26 * add_sugar = 52

        (26 * add_sugar) / 26 = 52 / 26

        =:
            (26 * add_sugar) / 26
            add_sugar
        add_sugar = 52 / 26

        =:
            52 / 26
            2
        add_sugar = 2

description: Question:甲乙两地相距2006千米，客车和货车同时从两地相对开出，相向而行，12小时后两车还相距200千米，已知货车每小时行60千米，则客车每小时行多少千米．

title: Math23k_16878
description: Question:车站有一批货物，第一天运走全部货物的(1/3)多20吨，第二天运走全部货物的(1/2)少25吨，这时车站还存货物37吨，这批货物一共有多少吨？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_goods, day1, day2, remaining R:
        day1 = (1 / 3) * total_goods + 20
        day2 = (1 / 2) * total_goods - 25
        remaining = 37
        total_goods - day1 - day2 = remaining
        =>:
            total_goods = 192
    prove:
        day1 = (1 / 3) * total_goods + 20
        day2 = (1 / 2) * total_goods - 25
        total_goods - ((1 / 3) * total_goods + 20) - ((1 / 2) * total_goods - 25) = 37
        total_goods - (1 / 3) * total_goods - 20 - (1 / 2) * total_goods + 25 = 37
        total_goods - (1 / 3) * total_goods - (1 / 2) * total_goods + 5 = 37
        total_goods - (2 / 6) * total_goods - (3 / 6) * total_goods + 5 = 37
        total_goods - (5 / 6) * total_goods + 5 = 37
        (6 / 6) * total_goods - (5 / 6) * total_goods + 5 = 37
        (1 / 6) * total_goods + 5 = 37
        (1 / 6) * total_goods = 37 - 5
        (1 / 6) * total_goods = 32
        total_goods = 32 * 6
        total_goods = 192

title: Math23k_5629
description: Question:从9.6里连续减去多少个0.24，结果是0．
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, step, x R:
        total = 9.6
        step = 0.24
        total - step * x = 0
        =>:
            x = 40
    prove:
        =:
            total
            total - step * x + step * x
            0 + step * x
            step * x
        step * x = total

        =:
            x
            (step * x) / step
            total / step
        x = total / step

        x = 960 / 24
        x = 40

title: Math23k_8920
description: Question:口袋中有大小、材质相同的红球3个，白球4个和黑球5个，要想使从中摸出一个红球的可能性是(1/2)，应该再往口袋中放多少个红球．
full litex:
know @ratio_to_equation(a, b R):
    b > 0
    (a / b) = 1/2
    =>:
        2 * a = b

know @equal_subtract_right_to_zero(a, b R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - b = 0

know @sub_eq_zero_implies_eq(a, b R):
    a - b = 0
    =>:
        a = b

claim:
    forall red0, white0, black0, total0, x, a, b, prob R:
        red0 = 3
        white0 = 4
        black0 = 5
        total0 = red0 + white0 + black0
        a = red0 + x
        b = total0 + x
        prob = a / b
        b > 0
        prob = 1/2
        =>:
            x = 6
    prove:
        total0 = red0 + white0 + black0
        total0 = 3 + 4 + 5
        total0 = 12

        a = red0 + x
        a = 3 + x

        b = total0 + x
        b = 12 + x

        prob = a / b
        prob = (3 + x) / (12 + x)
        prob = 1/2

        $ratio_to_equation(a, b)
        2 * a = b
        2 * a = 2 * (3 + x)
        2 * (3 + x) = b
        2 * (3 + x) = 12 + x

        $equal_subtract_right_to_zero(2 * (3 + x), 12 + x)
        2 * (3 + x) - (12 + x) = 0

        =:
            2 * (3 + x) - (12 + x)
            6 + 2 * x - 12 - x
            x - 6

        x - 6 = 0
        $sub_eq_zero_implies_eq(x, 6)
        x = 6

            lose = 6
    prove:
        (2 / total) * total = (1 / 4) * total
        $mul_div_cancel(2, total)
        (2 / total) * total = 2
        2 = (1 / 4) * total
        2 * 4 = ((1 / 4) * total) * 4
        $cancel_quarter_four(total)
        2 * 4 = total
        2 * 4 = 8
        total = 8
        lose = total - win
        lose = 8 - 2
        lose = 6

title: Math23k_2794
description: Question:一个盒子里有多少个红球，8个白球，随便摸出一个球，摸到红球的可能性是(2/3)，摸到白球的可能性是(1/3)．
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = b * c

claim:
    forall red, white N_pos:
        white = 8
        red / (red + white) = 2 / 3
        =>:
            red = 16
    prove:
        $cross_multiply(red, red + white, 2, 3)
        3 * red = 2 * (red + white)
        3 * red = 2 * red + 2 * white
        3 * red - 2 * red = 2 * white
        red = 2 * white
        red = 2 * 8
        red = 16

title: Math23k_8419
description: Question:李刚看一本书，第一天看了全书的(1/5)，第二天看了24页，第3天看的页数是前两天看的总数的150%，这时还剩下全书的(1/4)没有看．问全书共有多页？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_pages, day1_pages, day2_pages, day3_pages, remaining_pages R:
        day1_pages = total_pages / 5
        day2_pages = 24
        day3_pages = 1.5 * (day1_pages + day2_pages)
        remaining_pages = total_pages / 4
        day1_pages + day2_pages + day3_pages + remaining_pages = total_pages
        =>:
            total_pages = 240
    prove:
        day1_pages = total_pages / 5
        day3_pages = 1.5 * (total_pages / 5 + 24)
        remaining_pages = total_pages / 4
        total_pages / 5 + 24 + 1.5 * (total_pages / 5 + 24) + total_pages / 4 = total_pages
        total_pages / 5 + 24 + 1.5 * total_pages / 5 + 36 + total_pages / 4 = total_pages
        total_pages / 5 + 1.5 * total_pages / 5 + total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        2.5 * total_pages / 5 + total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        total_pages / 2 + total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        3 * total_pages / 4 + 60 = total_pages
        60 = total_pages - 3 * total_pages / 4
        60 = total_pages / 4
        total_pages = 60 * 4
        total_pages = 240

title: Math23k_2386
description: Question:甲、乙合做一件工作，甲做的部分占乙的(2/5)，乙做的占全部工作的多少．
full litex:
know @cancellation_in_fraction(x, k R):
    not x = 0
    not k = 0
    =>:
        x / (k * x) = 1 / k

know @prod_nonzero(a, b R):
    not a = 0
    not b = 0
    =>:
        not a * b = 0

claim:
    forall B, A, total R:
        A = (2/5) * B
        total = B + A
        not B = 0
        not (7/5) = 0
        =>:
            B / total = 5/7
    prove:
        total = B + A
        total = B + (2/5) * B
        total = (1 + 2/5) * B
        1 + 2/5 = 7/5
        total = (7/5) * B
        $prod_nonzero(7/5, B)
        not ((7/5) * B) = 0
        not total = 0
        $cancellation_in_fraction(B, 7/5)
        =:
            B / total
            B / ((7/5) * B)
            1 / (7/5)
            5/7

title: Math23k_18929
description: Question:一根电线，第一次用去全长的12.5%，第二次用去23米，这时已用的和没用的电线的长度比是4：5，这根电线原来长多少米？
full litex:
know @proportion_cross(a, b, c, d R):
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = b * c

claim:
    forall x, used1, used2, used_total, unused R:
        used1 = (1/8) * x
        used2 = 23
        used_total = used1 + used2
        unused = x - used_total
        used_total / unused = 4 / 5
        =>:
            x = 72
    prove:
        used1 = (1/8) * x
        used2 = 23
        used_total = used1 + used2
        unused = x - used_total

        used_total / unused = 4 / 5
        $proportion_cross(used_total, unused, 4, 5)
        5 * used_total = 4 * unused

        =:
            5 * used_total
            5 * (used1 + used2)
            5 * ((1/8) * x + 23)
            (5/8) * x + 115

        =:
            4 * unused
            4 * (x - used_total)
            4 * (x - (used1 + used2))
            4 * (x - ((1/8) * x + 23))
            4 * ((7/8) * x - 23)
            (7/2) * x - 92

        (5/8) * x + 115 = (7/2) * x - 92
        (5/8) * x + 115 + 92 = (7/2) * x
        (5/8) * x + 207 = (7/2) * x
        207 = (7/2) * x - (5/8) * x

        =:
            (7/2) * x - (5/8) * x
            ((7/2) - (5/8)) * x
            ((28/8) - (5/8)) * x
            (23/8) * x

        207 = (23/8) * x
        207 * 8 = 23 * x
        1656 = 23 * x
        x = 1656 / 23
        x = 72

title: Math23k_13637
description: Question:如果甲数的(3/5)和乙数的(3/8)相等，甲数是40，则甲数比乙数少多少%．
full litex:
know @solve_ax_eq_b(a, x, b R):
    a != 0
    a * x = b
    =>:
        x = b / a

claim:
    forall jia, yi, three_over_five, three_over_eight, lhs, rhs, diff, percent R:
        jia = 40
        three_over_five = 3/5
        three_over_eight = 3/8
        lhs = three_over_five * jia
        rhs = three_over_eight * yi
        lhs = rhs
        diff = yi - jia
        percent = diff / yi * 100
        =>:
            percent = 37.5
    prove:
        lhs = (3/5) * 40
        lhs = 24
        lhs = rhs
        rhs = (3/8) * yi
        24 = rhs
        24 = (3/8) * yi
        (3/8) * yi = 24
        $solve_ax_eq_b(3/8, yi, 24)
        yi = 24 / (3/8)
        yi = (24 * 8) / 3
        yi = 64
        diff = yi - jia
        diff = 64 - 40
        diff = 24
        percent = diff / yi * 100
        percent = (24 / 64) * 100
        percent = (3/8) * 100
        percent = 0.375 * 100
        percent = 37.5

title: Math23k_10874
description: Question:去年某校参加数学奥林匹克竞赛的学生中，女生占总数的(1/4)，今年全校参赛的学生增加了20%，女生占总数的(1/3)，与去年相比，今年参赛的女生人数增加了多少%．
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, last_girls, this_total, this_girls, increase_girls, ratio, percent R:
        x > 0
        last_girls = (1/4) * x
        this_total = (6/5) * x
        this_girls = (1/3) * this_total
        increase_girls = this_girls - last_girls
        last_girls != 0
        ratio = increase_girls / last_girls
        percent = ratio * 100
        =>:
            percent = 60
    prove:
        this_girls = (1/3) * this_total
        this_girls = (1/3) * ((6/5) * x)
        this_girls = ((6/5) / 3) * x
        this_girls = (6 / (5 * 3)) * x
        this_girls = (6 / 15) * x
        this_girls = (2 / 5) * x

        last_girls = (1/4) * x

        increase_girls = this_girls - last_girls
        increase_girls = ((2/5) * x) - ((1/4) * x)
        increase_girls = ((2/5) - (1/4)) * x
        increase_girls = ((8/20) - (5/20)) * x
        increase_girls = (3/20) * x

        ratio = increase_girls / last_girls
        ratio = ((3/20) * x) / ((1/4) * x)
        ratio = (3/20) / (1/4)
        ratio = (3/20) * (4/1)
        ratio = 12 / 20
        ratio = 3 / 5

        percent = ratio * 100
        percent = (3/5) * 100
        percent = 60

title: Math23k_11024
description: Question:两个工程队挖一条水渠，甲队每天挖1.4千米，乙队每天挖1.6千米，它们合作挖了10天后，还剩9千米．这条水渠有多少千米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall daily_teamA, daily_teamB, days, remaining, total_length R:
        daily_teamA = 1.4
        daily_teamB = 1.6
        days = 10
        remaining = 9
        total_length = (daily_teamA + daily_teamB) * days + remaining
        =>:
            total_length = 39
    prove:
        daily_teamA + daily_teamB = 1.4 + 1.6 = 3
        (daily_teamA + daily_teamB) * days = 3 * 10 = 30
        total_length = 30 + 9 = 39

title: Math23k_12089
description: Question:一辆汽车5小时行驶了620千米，照这样的速度行驶，如果再行驶744千米．这辆汽车前后一共需要用多少时间？

        distance1 = 620

        distance2 = 744

        total_time = time1 + time2
        =>:

        time2 = 744 / 124 = 6
        total_time = 5 + 6 = 11

title: Math23k_345
description: Question:彩电厂生产一批彩电，上午运走全部的75%，下午运走240台，这时已运走的占全部彩电的95%，上午运走多少台？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total, morning, afternoon R:
        morning = 0.75 * total
        afternoon = 240
        morning + afternoon = 0.95 * total
        =>:
            morning = 900
    prove:
        0.75 * total + 240 = 0.95 * total
        0.95 * total - 0.75 * total = 240
        (0.95 - 0.75) * total = 240
        0.20 * total = 240
        total = 240 / 0.20 = 1200
        morning = 0.75 * 1200 = 900

description: Question:某人骑自行经过了一段坡路．上坡以每秒4米的速度骑了60秒，下坡以每秒6.5米的速度骑了40秒．自行车在这坡路上行驶的平均速度=？

        up_speed = 4

        total_distance = up_speed * up_time + down_speed * down_time
        total_time = up_time + down_time
        avg_speed = total_distance / total_time

title: Math23k_5208
description: Question:一项工程，甲队单独做需要18天完成；乙队单独做15天完成全部工程的(2/3)．如果两队合做，多少天可完成这项工程？
full litex:
claim:

        work_rate_B = (2 / 3) / 15

        days = 1 / combined_rate
        =>:

    prove:

        work_rate_B = (2 / 3) / 15 = 2 / 45
        combined_rate = 1 / 18 + 2 / 45 = 5 / 90 + 4 / 90 = 9 / 90 = 1 / 10
        days = 1 / (1 / 10) = 10

title: Math23k_3147
description: Question:小华从甲地步行去乙地，第一天行了全程的20%，第二天行了全程的(1/4)，离终点还有22千米，甲、乙两地相距多少千米？

claim:
    forall distance, day1, day2, total_walked, remaining R:
        day1 = 0.2 * distance
        day2 = 0.25 * distance
        total_walked = day1 + day2
        remaining = distance - total_walked
        remaining = 22
        =>:
            distance = 40
    prove:
        total_walked = 0.2 * distance + 0.25 * distance = 0.45 * distance
        remaining = distance - 0.45 * distance = 0.55 * distance
        0.55 * distance = 22
        distance = 22 / 0.55 = 40

title: Math23k_20985
description: Question:某车间计划生产3000个零件，生产8天后，已经完成(2/5)，照这样计算，这批零件多少天可完成？

    forall total_parts, completed_parts, daily_production, remaining_parts, remaining_days, total_days R:
        total_parts = 3000
        completed_parts = total_parts * (2 / 5)
        daily_production = completed_parts / 8
        remaining_parts = total_parts - completed_parts
        remaining_days = remaining_parts / daily_production
        total_days = 8 + remaining_days
        =>:
            total_days = 20
    prove:
        completed_parts = 3000 * (2 / 5) = 1200
        daily_production = 1200 / 8 = 150
        remaining_parts = 3000 - 1200 = 1800
        remaining_days = 1800 / 150 = 12
        total_days = 8 + 12 = 20

title: Math23k_8290
description: Question:某校学生在操场上排队做操，只知人数在90～110之间，如果排成3列不多也不少；如果排成5列则少2人；如果排成7列则少4人．共有学生多少人．
full litex:
know @combine_5_7_to_35(n, k5, k7, p N_pos):
    n = 5 * k5 + 3
    n = 7 * k7 + 3
    =>:
        n = 35 * p + 3

know @p_multi3_if_n_equal_forms(n, p, s, q N_pos):
    n = 35 * p + 3
    n = 3 * s
    =>:
        p = 3 * q

know @q_eq_1_from_bounds(n, q N_pos):
    n = 105 * q + 3
    90 <= n
    n <= 110
    =>:
        q = 1

claim:
    forall n, k5, k7, s, p, q N_pos:
        90 <= n
        n <= 110
        n = 3 * s
        n = 5 * k5 + 3
        n = 7 * k7 + 3
        =>:
            n = 108
    prove:
        $combine_5_7_to_35(n, k5, k7, p)
        n = 35 * p + 3

        $p_multi3_if_n_equal_forms(n, p, s, q)
        p = 3 * q

        =:
            n
            35 * p + 3
            35 * (3 * q) + 3
            105 * q + 3

        $q_eq_1_from_bounds(n, q)
        q = 1

        =:
            n
            105 * q + 3
            105 * 1 + 3
            105 + 3
            108

title: Math23k_5757
description: Question:鸡的只数比鸭少20%，鸭的只数比鸡多百分之几？
full litex:
know @positive_times_positive_is_positive(a, b R):
    a > 0
    b > 0
    =>:
        a * b > 0

know @positive_not_zero(x R):
    x > 0
    =>:
        not x = 0

know @cancel_common_nonzero_factor(x, y, k R):
    not k = 0
    =>:
        (x * k) / (y * k) = x / y

claim:
    forall c, d, diff, ratio, percent R:
        d > 0
        c = d - (1/5) * d
        diff = d - c
        ratio = diff / c
        percent = ratio * 100
        =>:
            percent = 25
    prove:
        c = d - (1/5) * d
        c = (1 - 1/5) * d
        c = (4/5) * d

        diff = d - c
        diff = d - (4/5) * d
        diff = (1 - 4/5) * d
        diff = (1/5) * d

        4/5 > 0
        $positive_times_positive_is_positive(4/5, d)
        (4/5) * d > 0
        c = (4/5) * d
        c > 0
        $positive_not_zero(c)
        not c = 0

        ratio = diff / c
        ratio = ((1/5) * d) / ((4/5) * d)
        $positive_not_zero(d)
        not d = 0
        $cancel_common_nonzero_factor(1/5, 4/5, d)
        ((1/5) * d) / ((4/5) * d) = (1/5) / (4/5)
        ratio = (1/5) / (4/5)
        ratio = 1/4

        percent = ratio * 100
        percent = (1/4) * 100
        percent = 25

title: Math23k_124
description: Question:小明看一全书，第一天看了全书的30%，第二天看了15页，这时已看的和未看的页数的比是2：3，这本书有多少页？
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    b != 0
    d != 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

know @add_equal_both_sides(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a + c = b + c

know @linear_divide(a, x, b R):
    a != 0
    a * x = b
    =>:
        x = b / a

claim:
    forall x, day1_ratio, day2_pages, ratio_num, ratio_den, read_total, unread R:
        day1_ratio = 3/10
        day2_pages = 15
        ratio_num = 2
        ratio_den = 3
        read_total = day1_ratio * x + day2_pages
        unread = x - read_total
        ratio_den != 0
        unread != 0
        5 != 0
        (1/10) != 0
        read_total / unread = ratio_num / ratio_den
        =>:
            x = 150
    prove:
        read_total = (3/10) * x + 15
        unread = x - read_total
        unread = x - ((3/10) * x + 15)
        unread = x - (3/10) * x - 15
        1 - 3/10 = 7/10
        unread = (7/10) * x - 15

        $cross_multiply(read_total, unread, ratio_num, ratio_den)
        read_total * ratio_den = ratio_num * unread
        3 * read_total = 2 * unread

        unread = x - read_total
        =:
            2 * unread
            2 * (x - read_total)
            2 * x - 2 * read_total

        3 * read_total = 2 * x - 2 * read_total
        $add_equal_both_sides(3 * read_total, 2 * x - 2 * read_total, 2 * read_total)
        3 * read_total + 2 * read_total = 2 * x - 2 * read_total + 2 * read_total

        =:
            3 * read_total + 2 * read_total
            (3 + 2) * read_total
            5 * read_total
        =:
            2 * x - 2 * read_total + 2 * read_total
            2 * x + (-2 * read_total + 2 * read_total)
            2 * x + 0
            2 * x

        5 * read_total = 2 * x
        $linear_divide(5, read_total, 2 * x)
        read_total = (2 * x) / 5
        read_total = (2/5) * x

        read_total = (3/10) * x + 15
        (3/10) * x + 15 = (2/5) * x
        $add_equal_both_sides((3/10) * x + 15, (2/5) * x, -(3/10) * x)
        (3/10) * x + 15 - (3/10) * x = (2/5) * x - (3/10) * x

        =:
            (3/10) * x + 15 - (3/10) * x
            ((3/10) * x - (3/10) * x) + 15
            0 + 15
            15
        =:
            (2/5) * x - (3/10) * x
            ((2/5) - (3/10)) * x
            (4/10 - 3/10) * x
            (1/10) * x

        15 = (1/10) * x
        $linear_divide(1/10, x, 15)
        x = 15 / (1/10)
        x = 150

title: Math23k_10415
description: Question:一辆客车和一辆货车分别从A、B两地同时出发相对而行．客车每小时行80千米，货车每小时行全程的(1/12)．当货车行至全程的(2/3)时，客车再行全程的(1/9)到达B地．求AB两地相距多少千米？
full litex:
know @left_cancel_mul_nonzero(a, b, c R):
    not a = 0
    a * b = a * c
    =>:
        b = c

know @npos_nonzero(n N_pos):
    =>:
        not n = 0

claim:
    forall x N_pos, v_bus, v_truck, frac_partial, frac_remaining, t, dist_truck_partial, dist_bus_first, equation_lhs, equation_rhs R:
        v_bus = 80
        frac_partial = 2/3
        frac_remaining = 1/9
        v_truck = x / 12
        dist_truck_partial = x * frac_partial
        dist_truck_partial = v_truck * t
        dist_bus_first = v_bus * t
        equation_lhs = dist_bus_first + x * frac_remaining
        equation_rhs = x
        equation_lhs = equation_rhs
        =>:
            x = 720
    prove:
        dist_truck_partial = x * (2/3)
        12 * dist_truck_partial = 12 * (v_truck * t)
        =:
            12 * dist_truck_partial
            12 * (x * (2/3))
            (12 * (2/3)) * x
            8 * x
        =:
            12 * (v_truck * t)
            (12 * v_truck) * t
            (12 * (x / 12)) * t
            x * t
        =:
            8 * x
            x * 8
        $npos_nonzero(x)
        $left_cancel_mul_nonzero(x, 8, t)
        8 = t

        dist_bus_first = v_bus * t
        dist_bus_first = 80 * 8
        dist_bus_first = 640

        x * frac_remaining = x * (1/9)
        x * (1/9) = x / 9
        equation_lhs = dist_bus_first + x * frac_remaining
        equation_lhs = 640 + x * (1/9)
        equation_lhs = 640 + x / 9
        equation_rhs = x
        equation_lhs = equation_rhs

        640 + x / 9 = x
        640 = x - x / 9
        x - x / 9 = (9 * x - x) / 9
        x - x / 9 = 8 * x / 9
        640 = 8 * x / 9
        640 * 9 = 8 * x
        5760 = 8 * x
        x = 5760 / 8
        x = 720

description: Question:把一个棱长为12厘米的正方体钢坯锻造成高和宽都是4厘米的长方体的钢材，长=多少厘米？

title: Math23k_1522
description: Question:我校六年级上学期有学生240人，其中男生占(1/4)，本学期又转来若干名男生，这样男生人数占六年级总人数的(1/3)，本学期转来多少名男生？
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    b != 0
    d != 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = c * b

know @mul_div_cancel_left(k, y R):
    k != 0
    =>:
        (k * y) / k = y

claim:
    forall total_prev, male_ratio_prev, male_prev, x, total_now, male_now, male_ratio_now R:
        total_prev = 240
        male_ratio_prev = 1/4
        male_prev = total_prev * male_ratio_prev
        male_now = male_prev + x
        total_now = total_prev + x
        male_ratio_now = 1/3
        total_now != 0
        3 != 0
        2 != 0
        male_now / total_now = male_ratio_now
        =>:
            x = 30
    prove:
        male_prev = 240 * (1/4)
        male_prev = 60

        male_now = 60 + x
        total_now = 240 + x
        male_ratio_now = 1/3
        male_now / total_now = 1/3

        $cross_multiply(male_now, total_now, 1, 3)
        male_now * 3 = 1 * total_now
        1 * total_now = total_now
        male_now * 3 = total_now

        male_now = 60 + x
        (60 + x) * 3 = total_now
        3 * (60 + x) = total_now

        total_now = 240 + x
        3 * (60 + x) = 240 + x

        3 * (60 + x) = 3 * 60 + 3 * x
        3 * 60 = 180
        3 * 60 + 3 * x = 180 + 3 * x
        3 * (60 + x) = 180 + 3 * x

        180 + 3 * x = 240 + x

        (180 + 3 * x) - 180 = (240 + x) - 180
        3 * x = (240 + x) - 180
        (240 + x) - 180 = 240 - 180 + x
        240 - 180 = 60
        3 * x = 60 + x

        (3 * x) - x = (60 + x) - x
        (60 + x) - x = 60
        (3 * x) - x = 60
        2 * x = 60

        (2 * x) / 2 = 60 / 2
        $mul_div_cancel_left(2, x)
        (2 * x) / 2 = x
        x = 60 / 2
        60 / 2 = 30
        x = 30

title: Math23k_3674
description: Question:甲乙两人同时、同地出发去同一目的地．甲每分行65米，乙每分行75米．途中乙休息了10分钟，结果乙比甲迟到2分到目的地．求两地相距多少米？
full litex:

        time_armor = distance / 65
        distance / 75 = time_armor - 8
        =>:
            distance = 3900
    prove:

        (75 * distance - 65 * distance) / (65 * 75) = 8

        10 * distance = 39000
        distance = 39000 / 10
        distance = 3900

        car_time_after = 4
        truck_lead_time = 1
        truck_total_time = car_time_after + truck_lead_time
        truck_distance = truck_speed * truck_total_time
        car_distance = total_distance - truck_distance
        car_speed = car_distance / car_time_after
        =>:
            car_speed = 60

title: Math23k_18179
description: Question:一箱桃子分给甲、乙、丙，甲分得了全部的(1/4)+7个，乙分得了全部的(1/5)+5个，丙分得其余的一半，最后剩下的是全部的(1/8)，这箱桃子有几个？
full litex:
know @mul_preserves_equality(a, b, k R):
    a = b
    =>:
        k * a = k * b
know @add_preserves_equality(a, b, k R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a + k = b + k

claim:
    forall x, a_share, b_share, ab_sum, rem_after_ab, c_share, leftover R:
        a_share = (1/4) * x + 7
        b_share = (1/5) * x + 5
        ab_sum = a_share + b_share
        rem_after_ab = x - ab_sum
        c_share = (1/2) * rem_after_ab
        leftover = (1/2) * rem_after_ab
        leftover = (1/8) * x
        =>:
            x = 40
    prove:
        =:
            ab_sum
            a_share + b_share
            ((1/4) * x + 7) + ((1/5) * x + 5)
            (1/4) * x + (1/5) * x + 7 + 5
            (1/4) * x + (1/5) * x + 12
            (5/20) * x + (4/20) * x + 12
            (9/20) * x + 12

        =:
            rem_after_ab
            x - ab_sum
            x - ((9/20) * x + 12)
            x - (9/20) * x - 12
            (20/20) * x - (9/20) * x - 12
            (11/20) * x - 12

        =:
            c_share
            (1/2) * rem_after_ab
            (1/2) * ((11/20) * x - 12)
            (11/40) * x - 6

        =:
            leftover
            (1/2) * rem_after_ab
            (1/2) * ((11/20) * x - 12)
            (11/40) * x - 6

        =:
            (11/40) * x - 6
            leftover
            (1/8) * x

        $mul_preserves_equality((11/40) * x - 6, (1/8) * x, 40)

        =:
            11 * x - 240
            40 * ((11/40) * x - 6)
            40 * ((1/8) * x)
            5 * x

        $add_preserves_equality(11 * x - 240, 5 * x, 240)

        =:
            11 * x
            (11 * x - 240) + 240
            (5 * x) + 240
            5 * x + 240

        $add_preserves_equality(11 * x, 5 * x + 240, -5 * x)

        =:
            11 * x + (-5 * x)
            6 * x
        =:
            (5 * x + 240) + (-5 * x)
            (5 * x + -5 * x) + 240
            0 + 240
            240

        $mul_preserves_equality(6 * x, 240, 1/6)

        =:
            (1/6) * (6 * x)
            x
        =:
            (1/6) * 240
            240 / 6
            40

title: Math23k_12229
description: Question:小强参加学校体育集训队后，跑100米的时间从原来的18秒缩短到15秒，小强跑百米的速度比原来提高了百分之几？（百分号前保留一位小数）
full litex:
claim:
    forall original_time, new_time, original_speed, new_speed, speed_increase, percentage_increase R:
        original_time = 18
        new_time = 15
        original_speed = 100 / original_time
        new_speed = 100 / new_time
        speed_increase = new_speed - original_speed
        percentage_increase = (speed_increase / original_speed) * 100
        =>:
            percentage_increase = 20
    prove:
        original_speed = 100 / 18
        new_speed = 100 / 15
        speed_increase = (100 / 15) - (100 / 18)
        speed_increase = (100 * 18 - 100 * 15) / (15 * 18) = (1800 - 1500) / 270 = 300 / 270 = 10 / 9
        percentage_increase = ((10 / 9) / (100 / 18)) * 100
        percentage_increase = (10 / 9) * (18 / 100) * 100
        percentage_increase = (10 * 18) / (9 * 100) * 100 = 180 / 900 * 100 = 0.2 * 100 = 20

title: Math23k_2555
description: Question:A是B的(1/5)，C是B的(1/4)，A是C的多少．
full litex:
know @cancel_common_factor(x, y, z R):
    y != 0
    z != 0
    =>:
        (x * y) / (z * y) = x / z

know @divide_by_unit_fraction(x, n R):
    n != 0
    =>:
        x / (1 / n) = x * n

claim:
    forall a, b, c, ratio R:
        a = (1/5) * b
        c = (1/4) * b
        b != 0
        c != 0
        ratio = a / c
        =>:
            ratio = 4/5
    prove:
        ratio = a / c
        a = (1/5) * b
        a / c = ((1/5) * b) / c
        c = (1/4) * b
        ((1/5) * b) / c = ((1/5) * b) / ((1/4) * b)
        $cancel_common_factor(1/5, b, 1/4)
        ((1/5) * b) / ((1/4) * b) = (1/5) / (1/4)
        ratio = (1/5) / (1/4)
        $divide_by_unit_fraction(1/5, 4)
        (1/5) / (1/4) = (1/5) * 4
        ratio = (1/5) * 4
        ratio = 4/5

title: Math23k_11273
description: Question:小明读一本书，第一天读了全书的(3/14)，第二天比第一天多读26页，这时已读的与剩下的页数比是7：5，这本书小明还有多少页没读？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x R, first_day R, second_day R, total_read R, left_pages R:
        first_day = (3/14) * x
        second_day = first_day + 26
        total_read = first_day + second_day
        left_pages = x - total_read
        5 * total_read = 7 * left_pages
        =>:
            left_pages = 70
    prove:
        =:
            total_read
            first_day + second_day
            (3/14) * x + (first_day + 26)
            (3/14) * x + ((3/14) * x + 26)
            (6/14) * x + 26
            (3/7) * x + 26

        =:
            7 * left_pages
            7 * (x - total_read)
            7 * x - 7 * total_read
        5 * total_read = 7 * x - 7 * total_read
        5 * total_read + 7 * total_read = 7 * x
        12 * total_read = 7 * x

        =:
            total_read
            (3/7) * x + 26
        12 * total_read = 7 * x
        =:
            12 * total_read
            12 * ((3/7) * x + 26)
        12 * ((3/7) * x + 26) = 7 * x
        =:
            12 * ((3/7) * x + 26)
            12 * (3/7 * x) + 12 * 26
            (12 * 3 / 7) * x + 312
            (36/7) * x + 312
        (36/7) * x + 312 = 7 * x

        7 * ((36/7) * x + 312) = 7 * (7 * x)
        =:
            7 * ((36/7) * x + 312)
            7 * ((36/7) * x) + 7 * 312
            (7 * 36 / 7) * x + 2184
            36 * x + 2184
        =:
            7 * (7 * x)
            49 * x

        36 * x + 2184 = 49 * x
        2184 = 49 * x - 36 * x
        2184 = 13 * x
        x = 2184 / 13
        x = 168

        =:
            (3/7) * x
            (3/7) * 168
            72
        total_read = (3/7) * x + 26
        total_read = 72 + 26
        total_read = 98

        left_pages = x - total_read
        =:
            x - total_read
            168 - 98
            70
