description: Question:老王花1260元买了一台洗衣机，比促销前便宜了240元．便宜百分之几？
full litex:
claim:
    forall paid, discount_amount, original_price, discount_percent R:
        paid = 1260
        discount_amount = 240
        original_price = paid + discount_amount
        discount_percent = discount_amount / original_price * 100
        =>:
            discount_percent = 16
    prove:
        original_price = 1260 + 240 = 1500
        discount_percent = 240 / 1500 * 100 = 0.16 * 100 = 16

title: Math23k_3888
description: Question:新学期开学了，张老师为同学们购买桌椅，买2张桌子和3把椅子的钱同样多．每把椅子56元，每张桌子多少元？
full litex:
claim:
    forall price_table, price_chair, total_tables, total_chairs R:
        price_chair = 56
        total_tables = 2
        total_chairs = 3
        total_tables * price_table = total_chairs * price_chair
        =>:
            price_table = 84
    prove:
        total_chairs * price_chair = 3 * 56 = 168
        total_tables * price_table = 2 * price_table
        2 * price_table = 168
        price_table = 168 / 2 = 84

        adult_ticket = 25

        students = 112

title: Math23k_7370
description: Question:甲乙两人从相距150米的两地同时同向行走，甲在前面每分钟走65米，在后面每分钟走75米，几分钟后乙可以追上甲？
full litex:
claim:
    forall initial_distance, speed_A, speed_B, relative_speed, time R:
        initial_distance = 150
        speed_A = 65
        speed_B = 75
        relative_speed = speed_B - speed_A
        time = initial_distance / relative_speed
        =>:
            time = 15
    prove:
        relative_speed = 75 - 65 = 10
        time = 150 / 10 = 15

title: Math23k_9737
description: Question:梨树棵数比苹果树的棵数少30%，那么梨树棵数是苹果树的多少%．
full litex:
claim:
    forall apple_count, pear_count, ratio, percent R:
        apple_count > 0
        pear_count = apple_count - (3/10) * apple_count
        ratio = pear_count / apple_count
        percent = ratio * 100
        =>:
            percent = 70
    prove:
        pear_count = apple_count - (3/10) * apple_count
        pear_count = (1 - 3/10) * apple_count
        1 - 3/10 = 7/10
        pear_count = (7/10) * apple_count
        ratio = ((7/10) * apple_count) / apple_count
        ratio = 7/10
        percent = (7/10) * 100
        percent = 70

title: Math23k_2976
description: Question:有一个长方体蓄水池，长3米、宽2米、高1.2米．水池里水深0.5米．与水接触的面积=多少平方米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall length, width, water_depth, bottom_area, long_side_area, short_side_area, total_area R:
        length = 3
        width = 2
        water_depth = 0.5
        bottom_area = length * width
        long_side_area = 2 * (length * water_depth)
        short_side_area = 2 * (width * water_depth)
        total_area = bottom_area + long_side_area + short_side_area
        =>:
            total_area = 11
    prove:
        bottom_area = 3 * 2 = 6
        long_side_area = 2 * (3 * 0.5) = 2 * 1.5 = 3
        short_side_area = 2 * (2 * 0.5) = 2 * 1 = 2
        total_area = 6 + 3 + 2 = 11

title: Math23k_6632
description: Question:师徒两人合做一批零件，徒弟做了总数(2/7)，比师傅少做21个，这批零件有多少个？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, apprentice, master R:
        apprentice = (2 / 7) * x
        master = apprentice + 21
        x = apprentice + master
        =>:
            x = 49
    prove:
        x = apprentice + (apprentice + 21) = 2 * apprentice + 21
        x = 2 * (2 / 7 * x) + 21
        x = (4 / 7) * x + 21
        x - (4 / 7) * x = 21
        (3 / 7) * x = 21
        x = 21 * (7 / 3)
        x = 49

title: Math23k_10256
description: Question:小明把自己画片的(1/6)给妹妹，这时妹妹的画片数正好是小明的(3/5)，已知妹妹原有画片17张，小明原有画片多少张？（列式解答）
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, sister_initial, sister_final, ming_final R:
        sister_initial = 17
        sister_final = sister_initial + x / 6
        ming_final = 5 / 6 * x
        sister_final = 3 / 5 * ming_final
        =>:
            x = 51
    prove:
        sister_final = 17 + x / 6
        ming_final = 5 / 6 * x
        sister_final = 3 / 5 * (5 / 6 * x) = 1 / 2 * x
        17 + x / 6 = 1 / 2 * x
        17 = 1 / 2 * x - 1 / 6 * x
        17 = 3 / 6 * x - 1 / 6 * x
        17 = 2 / 6 * x = 1 / 3 * x
        x = 17 * 3 = 51

title: Math23k_13514
description: Question:一个比的前项是(1/2)，比值是(1/3)，后项=．
full litex:
know @division_to_multiplication(a, b, c R):
    a / b = c
    =>:
        a = b * c

claim:
    forall antecedent, ratio, x R:
        antecedent = 1/2
        ratio = 1/3
        antecedent / x = ratio
        =>:
            x = 3/2
    prove:
        $division_to_multiplication(antecedent, x, ratio)
        antecedent = x * ratio
        ratio * 3 = (1/3) * 3
        ratio * 3 = 1
        =:
            x
            x * 1
            x * (ratio * 3)
            (x * ratio) * 3
            antecedent * 3
            (1/2) * 3
            3/2

title: Math23k_18030
description: Question:一辆汽车从甲地到乙地，第一小时行了全长的20%，第二小时比第一小时多行15千米，离乙地还有165千米，甲、乙两地相距多少千米？

        second_hour = first_hour + 15
        first_hour + second_hour + 165 = distance
        =>:
            distance = 300

        first_hour + second_hour + 165 = 0.2 * distance + (0.2 * distance + 15) + 165 = 0.4 * distance + 180

        180 = 0.6 * distance
        distance = 180 / 0.6 = 300

title: Math23k_1619
description: Question:一种超级DVD影碟机，商店将进价加40%定价．然后按定价的90%出售，并且每台送“的士”费50元，这样每台仍可以获利润（赚）262元，求这种影碟机每台的进价=多少元？
full litex:
claim:
    forall cost_price, marked_price, actual_price, profit R:
        marked_price = cost_price * 1.4
        actual_price = marked_price * 0.9
        profit = actual_price - cost_price - 50
        profit = 262
        =>:
            cost_price = 1200
    prove:
        profit = 262
        actual_price = marked_price * 0.9
        marked_price = cost_price * 1.4
        actual_price = cost_price * 1.4 * 0.9 = cost_price * 1.26
        profit = cost_price * 1.26 - cost_price - 50 = cost_price * 0.26 - 50
        cost_price * 0.26 - 50 = 262
        cost_price * 0.26 = 262 + 50 = 312
        cost_price = 312 / 0.26 = 1200

title: Math23k_13705
description: Question:阿民家到学校有28km，全程需要1h，除汽车之外，还需步行一段路，汽车的速度为36km/h，步行的速度是4km/h，则需要步行多少小时．

        total_distance = 28
        car_speed = 36
        walk_speed = 4
        car_time = 1 - walk_time
        total_distance = car_speed * car_time + walk_speed * walk_time
        =>:
            walk_time = 0.25
    prove:
        car_time = 1 - walk_time
        total_distance = 36 * (1 - walk_time) + 4 * walk_time
        28 = 36 - 36 * walk_time + 4 * walk_time

title: Math23k_14326
description: Question:甲、乙两车同时从同一地点向相反的方向开出，行驶3.2时后两车相距304千米，甲车每时行驶43千米，乙车每时行驶多少千米？

        distance_b = v * 3.2

title: Math23k_16825
description: Question:果商站最近来了若干箱水果，第一天卖出总数的(1/3)还多2箱，第二天卖出的比剩下的(1/2)还少1箱，这时还剩余38箱没卖．问这批水果一共有多少箱？
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, first_day, remaining_after_first, second_day, remaining_after_second R:
        first_day = (1 / 3) * x + 2
        remaining_after_first = x - first_day
        second_day = (1 / 2) * remaining_after_first - 1
        remaining_after_second = remaining_after_first - second_day
        remaining_after_second = 38
        =>:
            x = 114
    prove:
        first_day = (1 / 3) * x + 2
        remaining_after_first = x - ((1 / 3) * x + 2) = (2 / 3) * x - 2
        second_day = (1 / 2) * ((2 / 3) * x - 2) - 1 = (1 / 3) * x - 1 - 1 = (1 / 3) * x - 2
        remaining_after_second = ((2 / 3) * x - 2) - ((1 / 3) * x - 2) = (1 / 3) * x
        (1 / 3) * x = 38
        x = 38 * 3 = 114

title: Math23k_16007
description: Question:0.2与(1/6)的和除它们的差，商=？
full litex:
claim:
    forall sum, difference, quotient R:
        sum = 0.2 + (1 / 6)
        difference = 0.2 - (1 / 6)
        quotient = sum / difference
        =>:
            quotient = 11
    prove:
        0.2 = 1 / 5
        sum = (1 / 5) + (1 / 6) = (6 / 30) + (5 / 30) = 11 / 30
        difference = (1 / 5) - (1 / 6) = (6 / 30) - (5 / 30) = 1 / 30
        quotient = (11 / 30) / (1 / 30) = (11 / 30) * (30 / 1) = 11

title: Math23k_2618
description: Question:甲班和乙班共83人，乙班和丙班共86人，丙班和丁班共88人，问甲班和丁班共多少人？
full litex:
claim:
    forall A1, B1, C1, D1, sum_AB, sum_BC, sum_CD, diff, AD N_pos:
        sum_AB = A1 + B1
        sum_BC = B1 + C1
        sum_CD = C1 + D1

        sum_AB = 83
        sum_BC = 86
        sum_CD = 88

        diff = sum_BC - sum_AB
        AD = A1 + D1
        =>:
            AD = 85
    prove:
        =:
            diff
            sum_BC - sum_AB
            (B1 + C1) - (A1 + B1)
            C1 - A1

        =:
            diff
            86 - 83
            3

        =:
            C1 - A1
            diff
            3

        =:
            (C1 + D1) - AD
            (C1 + D1) - (A1 + D1)
            C1 - A1
            3

        =:
            C1 + D1
            sum_CD
            88

        =:
            (C1 + D1) - AD
            88 - AD

        88 - AD = 3
        AD = 88 - 3
        AD = 85

title: Math23k_17180
description: Question:修一条路，已修和未修的千米数比是3：5．如果再修12千米，则已修和未修的千米数9：1，这条路共长多少千米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_length R:
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 12 = 9 * ( (5 / 8) * total_length - 12 )
        =>:
            total_length = 160 / 7
    prove:
        9 * ( (5 / 8) * total_length - 12 ) = (45 / 8) * total_length - 108
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 12 = (45 / 8) * total_length - 108
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 12 + 108 = (45 / 8) * total_length
        (3 / 8) * total_length + 120 = (45 / 8) * total_length
        120 = (45 / 8) * total_length - (3 / 8) * total_length
        120 = (42 / 8) * total_length
        total_length = 120 * (8 / 42)
        total_length = 120 * 8 / 42
        total_length = 960 / 42
        total_length = 160 / 7

title: Math23k_17406
description: Question:一次数学测验，全班平均分是91.2分，已知女生有21人，平均每人92分，男生平均每人90.5分．求这个班男生有多少人？
full litex:
know @sub_eq_preserves_equality(a, b, c R):
    a = b
    =>:
        a - c = b - c

claim:
    forall x, girls N_pos, avg_class, avg_girls, avg_boys, total_class, total_girls, total_boys R:
        girls = 21
        avg_class = 91.2
        avg_girls = 92
        avg_boys = 90.5
        total_class = avg_class * (x + girls)
        total_girls = avg_girls * girls
        total_boys = avg_boys * x
        total_class = total_girls + total_boys
        =>:
            x = 24
    prove:
        total_girls = 92 * 21
        total_girls = 1932

        total_class = 91.2 * (x + 21)
        total_class = 91.2 * x + 91.2 * 21
        91.2 * 21 = 1915.2
        total_class = 91.2 * x + 1915.2

        total_boys = 90.5 * x
        total_class = total_girls + total_boys
        total_class = 1932 + 90.5 * x

        91.2 * x + 1915.2 = 1932 + 90.5 * x

        $sub_eq_preserves_equality(91.2 * x + 1915.2, 1932 + 90.5 * x, 90.5 * x)

        =:
            (91.2 * x + 1915.2) - 90.5 * x
            91.2 * x + 1915.2 - 90.5 * x
            0.7 * x + 1915.2

        =:
            (1932 + 90.5 * x) - 90.5 * x
            1932 + 90.5 * x - 90.5 * x
            1932

        $sub_eq_preserves_equality(0.7 * x + 1915.2, 1932, 1915.2)

        =:
            (0.7 * x + 1915.2) - 1915.2
            0.7 * x

        =:
            1932 - 1915.2
            16.8

        0.7 * x = 16.8
        x = 16.8 / 0.7
        x = 24

title: Math23k_14201
description: Question:某服装厂原有工人500人，其中女工占(4/5)，今年又招进一批女工，这时女工占总人数的(5/6)，今年又招进多少人？
full litex:
know @cross_multiply(a, b, c, d R):
    b != 0
    d != 0
    a / b = c / d
    =>:
        a * d = b * c

know @subtract_both_sides(x, y, z R):
    x = y
    =>:
        x - z = y - z

claim:
    forall total_initial, female_ratio_initial, female_initial, added, female_ratio_now R:
        total_initial = 500
        female_ratio_initial = 4/5
        female_ratio_now = 5/6
        female_initial = total_initial * female_ratio_initial
        total_initial + added != 0
        6 != 0
        (female_initial + added) / (total_initial + added) = female_ratio_now
        =>:
            added = 100
    prove:
        female_initial = total_initial * female_ratio_initial
        female_initial = 500 * (4/5)
        female_initial = 400

        (female_initial + added) / (total_initial + added) = female_ratio_now
        (female_initial + added) / (total_initial + added) = 5/6
        $cross_multiply(female_initial + added, total_initial + added, 5, 6)
        6 * (female_initial + added) = 5 * (total_initial + added)

        6 * (female_initial + added) = 6 * female_initial + 6 * added
        6 * female_initial + 6 * added = 5 * (total_initial + added)
        5 * (total_initial + added) = 5 * total_initial + 5 * added
        6 * female_initial + 6 * added = 5 * total_initial + 5 * added

        female_initial = 400
        6 * female_initial = 6 * 400
        6 * 400 = 2400
        6 * female_initial + 6 * added = 2400 + 6 * added

        total_initial = 500
        5 * total_initial = 5 * 500
        5 * 500 = 2500
        5 * total_initial + 5 * added = 2500 + 5 * added

        2400 + 6 * added = 2500 + 5 * added

        $subtract_both_sides(2400 + 6 * added, 2500 + 5 * added, 5 * added)
        2400 + 6 * added - 5 * added = 2500 + 5 * added - 5 * added
        2400 + 6 * added - 5 * added = 2400 + added
        2500 + 5 * added - 5 * added = 2500
        2400 + added = 2500

        $subtract_both_sides(2400 + added, 2500, 2400)
        2400 + added - 2400 = 2500 - 2400
        2400 + added - 2400 = added
        2500 - 2400 = 100
        added = 100

title: Math23k_561
description: Question:A、B两地之间的道路分上坡和下坡两种路段，共70千米，兰兰上坡速度为5千米/时，下坡速度为7千米/时，去时用了10.5小时，则返回时用多少小时．
full litex:
claim:
    forall v_up, v_down, D, T_go, x, down_dist, T_return R:
        v_up = 5
        v_down = 7
        D = 70
        T_go = 10.5
        T_go = x / v_up + (D - x) / v_down
        down_dist = D - x
        T_return = x / v_down + down_dist / v_up
        =>:
            T_return = 13.5
    prove:
        10.5 = x / 5 + (70 - x) / 7
        10.5 * 35 = 35 * (x / 5 + (70 - x) / 7)
        10.5 * 35 = 35 * x / 5 + 35 * (70 - x) / 7
        10.5 * 35 = 7 * x + 5 * (70 - x)
        10.5 * 35 = 7 * x + 350 - 5 * x
        10.5 * 35 = 2 * x + 350
        367.5 = 2 * x + 350
        367.5 - 350 = 2 * x
        17.5 = 2 * x
        17.5 / 2 = x
        x = 8.75
        down_dist = 70 - 8.75
        down_dist = 61.25
        x / v_down = 8.75 / 7
        x / v_down = 1.25
        down_dist / v_up = 61.25 / 5
        down_dist / v_up = 12.25
        T_return = x / v_down + down_dist / v_up
        T_return = 1.25 + 12.25
        T_return = 13.5

        =>:
            planned_cost = 24000
    prove:
        actual_cost = planned_cost + (1 / 12) * planned_cost
        actual_cost = (13 / 12) * planned_cost

        planned_cost = 26000 * (12 / 13)
        planned_cost = 24000

title: Math23k_106
description: Question:一根木料，第一次用去全长的(3/8)，第二次用去2.2米，两次共用全长的(5/6)，第一次用去多少米？
full litex:
know @isolate_common_factor(A, B, S, X R):
    A * X + S = B * X
    =>:
        S = (B - A) * X

know @solve_linear_scale(S, K, X R):
    K != 0
    S = K * X
    =>:
        X = S / K

know (11/24) != 0

claim:
    forall L, first_frac, total_frac, second_used, first_used R:
        first_frac = 3/8
        total_frac = 5/6
        second_used = 2.2
        first_used = first_frac * L
        first_frac * L + second_used = total_frac * L
        =>:
            first_used = 1.8
    prove:
        $isolate_common_factor(first_frac, total_frac, second_used, L)
        =:
            second_used
            (total_frac - first_frac) * L
            ((5/6) - (3/8)) * L
            ((20/24) - (9/24)) * L
            (11/24) * L
        =:
            second_used
            2.2
        2.2 = (11/24) * L
        $solve_linear_scale(2.2, (11/24), L)
        =:
            L
            2.2 / (11/24)
            2.2 * (24/11)
            52.8 / 11
            4.8
        =:
            first_used
            first_frac * L
            (3/8) * L
            (3/8) * 4.8
            1.8

title: Math23k_21244
description: Question:修一条公路，已经修了全长的(1/5)．如果再修100米，已修的与未修的比是1：3，这条公路全长多少米？
full litex:
know @ratio_to_linear(a, b R):
    a / b = 1 / 3
    =>:
        3 * a = b

know @linear_eq_solve(a, c, b, d, x R):
    a != c
    a * x + b = c * x + d
    =>:
        x = (d - b) / (a - c)

claim:
    forall x, repaired, repaired_after, unrepaired_after, a, b, c, d R:
        repaired = x / 5
        repaired_after = repaired + 100
        unrepaired_after = x - repaired_after
        repaired_after / unrepaired_after = 1 / 3
        a = 3 / 5
        b = 300
        c = 4 / 5
        d = -100
        =>:
            x = 2000
    prove:
        unrepaired_after = x - repaired_after
        unrepaired_after = x - (repaired + 100)
        unrepaired_after = x - repaired - 100
        repaired = x / 5
        unrepaired_after = x - x / 5 - 100
        unrepaired_after = (4 * x) / 5 - 100

        $ratio_to_linear(repaired_after, unrepaired_after)
        3 * repaired_after = unrepaired_after

        repaired_after = repaired + 100
        3 * (repaired + 100) = unrepaired_after
        repaired = x / 5
        3 * (x / 5 + 100) = unrepaired_after
        unrepaired_after = (4 * x) / 5 - 100
        3 * (x / 5 + 100) = (4 * x) / 5 - 100

        =:
            3 * (x / 5 + 100)
            (3 * x) / 5 + 300
            (4 * x) / 5 - 100

        a = 3 / 5
        b = 300
        c = 4 / 5
        d = -100

        =:
            a * x + b
            (3 * x) / 5 + 300
            (4 * x) / 5 - 100
            c * x + d

        a != c
        $linear_eq_solve(a, c, b, d, x)
        x = (d - b) / (a - c)

        d - b = -100 - 300
        d - b = -400

        a - c = 3 / 5 - 4 / 5
        a - c = -1 / 5

        x = (-400) / (-1 / 5)
        x = 2000

description: Question:多少吨的4倍是120吨．
full litex:
claim:
    forall x, total R:
        total = 120
        4 * x = total
        =>:
            x = 30
    prove:
        x = 120 / 4 = 30

title: Math23k_19037
description: Question:把7个红球和3个黄球装在同一个口袋中任意摸出1个球，然后再放入口袋．照这样摸20次，摸出红球的次数大约占总次数的多少．
full litex:
claim:
    forall red_balls, yellow_balls, total_balls, probability_red, total_tries, red_count, red_ratio R:
        red_balls = 7
        yellow_balls = 3
        total_balls = red_balls + yellow_balls
        probability_red = red_balls / total_balls
        total_tries = 20
        red_count = total_tries * probability_red
        red_ratio = red_count / total_tries
        =>:
            red_ratio = 0.7
    prove:
        total_balls = 7 + 3 = 10
        probability_red = 7 / 10 = 0.7
        red_count = 20 * 0.7 = 14
        red_ratio = 14 / 20 = 0.7

title: Math23k_17096
description: Question:一本故事书共160页，看了8天后，还剩下40页没有看完，平均每天看多少页？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_pages, remaining_pages, days, pages_read, average_pages R:
        total_pages = 160
        remaining_pages = 40
        days = 8
        pages_read = total_pages - remaining_pages
        average_pages = pages_read / days
        =>:
            average_pages = 15
    prove:
        pages_read = 160 - 40 = 120
        average_pages = 120 / 8 = 15

title: Math23k_8915
description: Question:一列火车从甲地到乙地，速度是145千米/时，行了18小时．甲乙两地相距多少千米？
full litex:
claim:
    forall distance, speed, time R:
        speed = 145
        time = 18
        distance = speed * time
        =>:
            distance = 2610
    prove:
        distance = 145 * 18 = 2610

title: Math23k_11054
description: Question:有3箱毛巾，每箱装12包，每包20条．共有毛巾多少条？
full litex:
claim:
    forall towels_per_box, boxes, towels_per_pack, packs, total_towels R:
        towels_per_pack = 20
        packs = 12
        boxes = 3
        towels_per_box = towels_per_pack * packs
        total_towels = towels_per_box * boxes
        =>:
            total_towels = 720
    prove:
        towels_per_box = 20 * 12 = 240
        total_towels = 240 * 3 = 720

title: Math23k_4889
description: Question:学校有120盒彩粉笔，比白粉笔少(3/5)，学校共有粉笔多少盒？
full litex:
claim:
    forall color_chalk, white_chalk, total_chalk R:
        color_chalk = 120
        color_chalk = (1 - 3/5) * white_chalk
        total_chalk = white_chalk + color_chalk
        =>:
            total_chalk = 420
    prove:
        white_chalk = color_chalk / (1 - 3/5) = 120 / (2/5) = 120 * 5/2 = 300
        total_chalk = 300 + 120 = 420

title: Math23k_9687
description: Question:商店买同一种电视，上午收售款14400元，下午收款23040元，上午比下午少售出3台，平均每台多少元？
full litex:
claim:
    forall total_income, income_morning, income_afternoon, price_per_tv, diff R:
        income_morning = 14400
        income_afternoon = 23040
        total_income = income_morning + income_afternoon
        diff = 3
        price_per_tv = (income_afternoon - income_morning) / diff
        =>:
            price_per_tv = 2880
    prove:
        total_income = 14400 + 23040 = 37440
        price_per_tv = (23040 - 14400) / 3 = 8640 / 3 = 2880

title: Math23k_3012
description: Question:一个果园里栽了125棵苹果树，梨树的棵数比苹果树的4倍少20棵．这个果园一共栽了多少棵树？
full litex:
claim:
    forall apple_trees, pear_trees, total_trees R:
        apple_trees = 125
        pear_trees = 4 * apple_trees - 20
        total_trees = apple_trees + pear_trees
        =>:
            total_trees = 605
    prove:
        pear_trees = 4 * 125 - 20 = 500 - 20 = 480
        total_trees = 125 + 480 = 605

title: Math23k_21172
description: Question:一辆汽车从甲地到乙地，6小时行了全程的(3/5)．照这样计算，还需多少小时才能到达．
full litex:
claim:
    forall time_partial, time_total, time_remaining R:
        time_partial = 6
        time_total = time_partial / (3 / 5)
        time_remaining = time_total - time_partial
        =>:
            time_remaining = 4
    prove:
        time_total = 6 / (3 / 5) = 6 * (5 / 3) = 10
        time_remaining = 10 - 6 = 4
